programme.title: Animal Cribs
programme.desc: Antonio helps a family who have opened their garden to all the dogs in the neighbourhood. They add a paddling pool, ramps and tunnels and custom dog houses!

programme.title: Animal Cops Phoenix
programme.desc: Investigator Marisa McHugh and Field Ops Manager Stacie DaBolt rescue a dog whose limbs have been bound together before being left to die in a skip.

programme.title: Animal Cops Phoenix
programme.desc: Investigator Marisa McHugh helps save the life of a puppy that was left for dead, before trying to hunt down the perpetrator.

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: The struggle for food, water and warmth continues as Tim heads into the harsh and freezing Wrangell Mountains to hunt mountain goats.

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: What happens when predator becomes prey? These are the harrowing stories of individuals who have been viciously attacked by wild animals and lived to tell the tale.

programme.title: My Cat From Hell
programme.desc: Marco and Aimee recently got married, but Marcos cat, Monty, is tearing them apart with his appetite for destruction - and will eat everything in sight.

programme.title: Pit Bulls And Parolees
programme.desc: The crew race the clock as they undergo a tough rescue mission. With animal control ready to take over, Tia must save the group of dogs before its too late.

programme.title: Pit Bulls And Parolees
programme.desc: Tia rescues a neglected puppy living in filthy conditions. Can they save her before its too late? Plus, two owners want a sibling for their 4-year-old dog, Chase.

programme.title: Pit Bulls And Parolees
programme.desc: Tania and Mariah help two puppies diagnosed with swimmers syndrome take their first steps. Plus, Marcel rescues a stray dog trapped beneath a house.

programme.title: The Bronx Zoo
programme.desc: The squirrel monkeys play hard-to-get with the keepers, then a pair of Komodo dragons meet for the first time with explosive results. Meanwhile, the Inca terns prepare for their first big flight.

programme.title: The Bronx Zoo
programme.desc: The keepers attempt to train Jackson, a golden eagle, for the educational programmes. Plus, the team shares the characteristics of a pack of African wild dogs.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff has been helping pets around the world for 30 years. He remembers some of the most special, inspiring and important cases he has taken on.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff treats a dog after it jumped from a fast-moving car on the highway. Plus, a couple of rescue guinea pigs cause a stir around the office.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: After weeks of being closed due to the pandemic, the Irwins prepare for the reopening of the zoo. Plus, Robert helps deliver a litter of tiger cubs.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Bindi and the family plan an emotional surprise for Terri in the Crocoseum. Plus, Robert gets stuck in with helping the zoos three new adorable tiger cubs.

programme.title: The Aquarium
programme.desc: Two African penguins have been together for 25 years, but one is now having problems with his eyes. Plus, a piranha needs surgery on his mouth.

programme.title: Pit Bulls And Parolees
programme.desc: Lizzy and Marcel team up to catch a stray pit bull on the streets near the centre. Tias memoir is complete and shes ready to share the first copy with her family.

programme.title: My Cat From Hell
programme.desc: Jackson meets Tara, whose cat, Cali, will not tolerate strangers. Plus, Kurts cat, Kurtis Jnr, destroys and eats everything in sight.

programme.title: Animal Cribs
programme.desc: Antonio helps a working dog with messy habits and turns the laundry room into a fully operational spa. The team creates a football-themed doggy paradise!

programme.title: Animal Cribs
programme.desc: Antonio transforms a cluttered basement housing more than 20 rescued reptiles, mammals and birds. The team build exotic enclosures and an entertainment space.

programme.title: How Do Animals Do That?
programme.desc: A game of underwater copycat shows how dolphins are some of the animal kingdoms smartest creatures. The secrets behind a geckos incredible and unique feet are revealed, and experts explain how leeches suck blood.

programme.title: How Do Animals Do That?
programme.desc: Are alligators music lovers? How a squirrel can hide up to 10,000 nuts in one season and still find most of them? And, can a bug survive in space?

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Journey around the world and discover how dogs became one of the most valued animals on the planet. From wild predators to friendly pets- this is the story of mans best friend.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: The CEO of a family-owned winery wants a beautiful reef tank for his living room - and it needs to be done before harvest season. Can the guys deliver on time?

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Adrian Peterson, one of the NFLs most valuable players, is requesting a classy aquarium that is even more precious that his trophy case full of awards.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: Mireya and Ronny make a powerful discovery in the area around the nest. And, Bryce suspects Bigfoot is emitting infrasound to repel the team from its territory.

programme.title: Great White Appetite
programme.desc: Remarkably, scientists have no accurate data on the great whites population, mating or even feeding behaviour. Can new information shed light on these mysterious hunters?

programme.title: Saved By The Barn
programme.desc: The team welcomes a blind goat called Charlie and two ducklings. Meanwhile, Ginger the goat embraces her new prosthetics and two pigs have a tussle.

programme.title: The Last Alaskans
programme.desc: The Alaskans prepare for trapping season. Heimos newest cabin may have fallen victim to a marauding bear. Meanwhile, Tyler and Ashley step up their house build.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: The team at Irelands only seal rescue centre recount their most amazing rescues. Egg was two months old when she had a flipper amputated.

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Journey around the world and discover how dogs became one of the most valued animals on the planet. From wild predators to friendly pets- this is the story of mans best friend.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: The Brown children face a big decision as they leave the Alaskan homestead. Ami prepares for her cancer treatment in California, and the family try to keep spirits up.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: As Ami prepares to undergo treatment for lung cancer, Bear, Bird, and Rain work to give the familys homestead back to the bush- and the wolfpack looks to the future.

programme.title: How Do Animals Do That?
programme.desc: A game of underwater copycat shows how dolphins are some of the animal kingdoms smartest creatures. The secrets behind a geckos incredible and unique feet are revealed, and experts explain how leeches suck blood.

programme.title: How Do Animals Do That?
programme.desc: Are alligators music lovers? How a squirrel can hide up to 10,000 nuts in one season and still find most of them? And, can a bug survive in space?

programme.title: Animal Cops Philadelphia
programme.desc: After a midnight call out the crew are shocked to find a grim menagerie of hundreds of birds, roosters and dogs. Have they been bred for fighting?

programme.title: Animal Cops Philadelphia
programme.desc: Animal Cops come to the rescue of a desperate cat stuck down a drain deep underground. Plus, they help an abandoned dog in danger of freezing to death.

programme.title: Animal Cops Philadelphia
programme.desc: Animal Cops discover a Doberman in an alarming state; its claws are so long theyve grown into the pads of its feet. The dog is rescued but can its leg be saved?

programme.title: Life at Vet University
programme.desc: Fourth year student Clint assists in an emergency C-section on a Cocker Spaniel, only to discover that the newborn puppy may not make it.

programme.title: Little Giants
programme.desc: Bradley and Billy are in southern California to find a super predator, the sugar glider. These marsupials are the dominant predator for their size.

programme.title: Little Giants
programme.desc: The guys are in Mpumalanga, South Africa, searching for the Cape mole-rat. They have giant, razor-sharp teeth, and are known as the king of the underground.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: An adventurous puppy falls off a trampoline, can Dr. Jeff and Petra mend its broken leg? Meanwhile, Susan takes care of a litter of kittens and their mum.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Tigger the cat is monitored closely for unusual eating habits. Plus, Dr. Jeff cautions an owner of the perils of buying online when she brings in her unwell puppy.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: After historical wildfires strike Australia, the Irwins race to rescue as many animals as possible. Robert and Terri help the severely injured koala population.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: After the birth of Talbert the giraffe, serious complications arise. Plus, Robert rescues an entangled swan caught in a fishing line.

programme.title: The Aquarium
programme.desc: Nandi, the aquariums smallest manta ray, is due her annual check up and some young ruddy ducks arrive at the aquarium and are introduced to their new habitat.

programme.title: Pit Bulls And Parolees
programme.desc: Villalobos faces one of their most challenging rescues when a house fire reveals a massive dog-hoarding situation. Two teachers fall in love with a deaf puppy.

programme.title: My Cat From Hell
programme.desc: Jackson works with a couple whose lovable cat, Zachary, sprays all over the house. Plus, he meets up with troublemaking cat named Freddie Krueger.

programme.title: Animal Cribs
programme.desc: Antonio and the team make a mountain cabin safer for Chickie, a blind senior dog. Plus, they build a Japanese-inspired indoor dog lounge.

programme.title: Animal Cribs
programme.desc: Antonio transforms the home of a couple who run a parrot sanctuary, housing 23 birds. The team creates a new outdoor aviary to allow the birds to fly free.

programme.title: Extinct Or Alive
programme.desc: Forrest is in the Faroe Islands looking for a trace of the great auk, a large flightless seabird that was declared extinct over 175 years ago.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Brittany Kerr, wife of country superstar Jason Aldean, wants Wayde and Brett to surprise her husband with a fish tank.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: NBA superstar Anthony Davis brings Wayde and Brett on board to transform an entire room into an aquarium! Will they be able to deliver a winning tank?

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: NFL superstar, Antonio Brown, thinks a fish tank will get him to this years Super Bowl. ATM must impress with a huge aquarium and an end zone dance!

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: The struggle for food, water and warmth continues as Tim heads into the harsh and freezing Wrangell Mountains to hunt mountain goats.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: When Theodore a four year old Maltese Terrier is brought into the vet hospital with a mystery illness, the vets struggle for a diagnosis as his condition gets worse.

programme.title: Saved By The Barn
programme.desc: Dwight the cow is taken to Indiana to receive hydrotherapy. Meanwhile, Dan welcomes over a dozen exotic farm animals and Lola the goat is ready to walk again!

programme.title: The Last Alaskans
programme.desc: Winter is fast approaching, and moose-hunting season begins. Tyler stalks an elusive bull, while Charlie gets a taste of why the region is known as starvation country.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: The Sheldrick Wildlife Trust rescue baby animals in Kenya. They saved elephant Malkia when she was six months old. Now shes ready to go back into the wild.

programme.title: Bad Dog
programme.desc: Monkey Boo has free reign of the house and his owners heart and Duke, a Labradoodle, is obsessed with getting into anything that might contain food.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: The Browns try to adapt after closing their dream homestead. They face a new start with the skills and knowledge from over 35 years in the Alaskan wilderness.

programme.title: Les mille et un crabes de lîle Christmas
programme.desc: L’île Christmas, territoire australien au large de Java, est le paradis des crabes. Ces crustaces, qui se comptent par millions, ne limitent pas leur terrain de jeu aux plages: on en rencontre dans les sous-bois, sur les parcours de golf, dans les grottes et jusque dans les maisons.

programme.title: Cephalopodes : le règne des ventouses
programme.desc: Alors que nombre d’espèces marines sont menacees, les seiches, calamars et autres poulpes prolifèrent. Une plongee à la rencontre de ces mollusques aux capacites d’adaptation exceptionnelles.

programme.title: Medecines dailleurs
programme.desc: La medecine traditionnelle vietnamienne est en perpetuel mouvement. La très forte influence de la doctrine chinoise et l’integration de la medecine occidentale l’obligent à se positionner et à se reinventer sans cesse. Bernard Fontanille part à la rencontre d’un personnage hors du commun : Dao Kim Long, 76 ans, qui a donne naissance à la "Nam Y", la nouvelle medecine vietnamienne.

programme.title: Kidnapping
programme.desc: Seul detenteur de la verite sur le sort de sa fille, lenqueteur danois Rolf Larsen reprend ses recherches aux côtes de sa consoeur française. Quatrième episode : l’enquete devoile les contours d’une nebuleuse criminelle entre le Danemark, la France et le Vietnam.

programme.title: Sophie Rollet contre Goodyear
programme.desc: Après la mort au volant de son mari routier, Sophie Rollet enquete en solitaire et decouvre limplication possible des pneumatiques Goodyear dans de nombreux autres drames. Par Sylvie Gilman et Thierry de Lestrade, le recit dune incroyable intuition.

programme.title: Le dessous des cartes
programme.desc: LEurope est contrainte de repenser sa securite et son autonomie strategique sous la pression des guerres de Vladimir Poutine et du retour de Donald Trump à la Maison-Blanche. Un defi historique auquel les allies europeens reunis au sein de l’Union europeenne et/ou de l’Otan doivent repondre en coordonnant leurs efforts. L’Europe sera-t-elle capable d’assurer elle-meme sa securite ?

programme.title: Oman sauvage
programme.desc: Le sultanat dOman, à l’extreme sud de la peninsule Arabique, abrite certains des ecosystèmes les plus productifs de notre planète. Des animaux rares y vivent : baleines à bosse près de ses côtes, loups dArabie, caracals et cameleons dArabie.

programme.title: 360° Reportage
programme.desc: En Bolivie, on appelle "cholitas" les descendantes des tribus indigènes andines. Sur le plus haut skatepark du monde, niche à 3 500 mètres d’altitude, des cholitas s’entraînent au skateboard, vetues de leur jupe traditionnelle à volants. Histoire de prouver qu’une cholita peut tout faire, meme tenir en equilibre sur une planche en bois et pratiquer un sport extreme prise des Occidentaux.

programme.title: 360° Reportage
programme.desc: Chaque jour, Janne Aikio parcourt de longues distances pour s’occuper de personnes âgees, en majorite des Samis. Une population dont le quotidien est rythme par des activites ancestrales. Pour que, meme à un âge avance, les Samis puissent rester dans leur environnement familier, le gouvernement finlandais fait tout pour leur assurer un maintien à domicile le plus longtemps possible.

programme.title: GEO Reportage
programme.desc: Pays du vin, la France est reputee pour la qualite et la diversite de son terroir viticole. Pourtant, les techniques de cultures traditionnelles et la course aux rendements ont epuise les sols et les pieds de vignes. Pour lutter contre ce declin annonce, une nouvelle generation de viticulteurs privilegie des methodes de production dans le respect de la nature.

programme.title: Invitation au voyage
programme.desc: Trois reportages pour (re)decouvrir le Canada : lAcadie dAntonine Maillet ; la Gaspesie, pays de Cocagne ; à Montreal, des recherches hallucinantes.

programme.title: Cuisines des terroirs
programme.desc: Jurgen et sa compagne Dagmar Graser sont vegetariens et utilisent lepeautre vert dans de nombreux plats : salade, risotto, rouleaux de printemps ou encore falafels. Avec ses arômes de noix, cette cereale sert aussi de base pour de delicieux gâteaux !

programme.title: Retour à lâge de pierre
programme.desc: Au coeur d’une des dernières regions sauvages d’Europe, une tribu de huit experts tente de survivre en utilisant les techniques des hommes de l’âge de pierre. Une aventure en trois volets, pour mieux comprendre le mode de vie de nos ancetres.

programme.title: Retour à lâge de pierre
programme.desc: Des experts tentent de survivre en utilisant les techniques de lepoque de l’âge de pierre. Deuxième volet de cette serie documentaire : à court de vivres, les membres de la tribu deploient toute leur energie dans la chasse. Plus que jamais, ils vont devoir unir leurs forces pour survivre une semaine de plus en pleine nature.

programme.title: Retour à lâge de pierre
programme.desc: Après trois semaines sans viande fraîche, les membres de la tribu ne peuvent plus se permettre de rentrer bredouilles.

programme.title: Mon mari, un assassin
programme.desc: Minette espionne Paul, son mari, alors que celui-ci part en week-end avec sa maîtresse. Peu après une violente dispute entre les amants, la rivale de Minette disparaît soudainement.

programme.title: Elle sappelait Sarah
programme.desc: Julia Jarmond, journaliste americaine installee en France depuis vingt ans, enquete sur la rafle du Vel dHiv des 16 et 17 juillet 1942. Au cours de ses investigations elle croise Sarah, qui avait 10 ans en juillet 1942. Cette rencontre va reveler un douloureux secret familial qui bouleversera la vie de Julia et celle de ses proches.

programme.title: Invitation au voyage
programme.desc: Trois reportages pour (re)decouvrir la Polynesie. Le voyage initiatique de Victor Segalen à Tahiti - Tiki, l’esprit des Marquises - À Papeete, les etoiles ouvrent la voie.

programme.title: 360° Reportage
programme.desc: Dans le nord de l’île de Java, Timbulsloko s’enfonce inexorablement dans la mer. Provoquee par le changement climatique, la montee des eaux contraint les habitants de ce village côtier à vivre au rythme des marees qui inondent leurs maisons. S’ils s’accommodent tant bien que mal de cette situation, ils refusent de se resigner face au desastre annonce.

programme.title: Chemins decole, chemins de tous les dangers
programme.desc: Dans la foret amazonienne, certains enfants doivent pagayer pendant plusieurs heures pour se rendre à l’ecole. Des traversees aussi ereintantes que perilleuses.

programme.title: ARTE Reportage
programme.desc: Hezbollah : la milice chiite libanaise, proche de lIran, est affaiblie depuis sa guerre avec Israël, mais encore armee / Au Nepal, la Gen Z, desabusee par linstabilite politique et la corruption, se mobilise pour ses droits / Des milliers de Serbes, portes par le mouvement etudiant, manifestent depuis dix mois contre le pouvoir.

programme.title: ARTE Journal
programme.desc: Chaque jour à 19h45, la redaction franco-allemande dARTE Journal propose une approche europeenne et culturelle de lactualite. Un regard original sur le monde.

programme.title: 28 minutes samedi
programme.desc: Retour sur l’actualite internationale : les reponses au climato-scepticisme de Donald Trump ; la condamnation de Nicolas Sarkozy ; les elections à venir en Moldavie ; les championnats du monde de cyclisme au Rwanda…

programme.title: Marie Stuart, l’enigme des lettres codees
programme.desc: Debut 2023, trois "casseurs de code" amateurs annoncent avoir retrouve et dechiffre une cinquantaine de missives de Marie Stuart. Ce documentaire retrace en parallèle le destin tragique de la reine d’Écosse, morte sur l’echafaud en 1587, et l’aventure palpitante du decryptage de sa correspondance secrète.

programme.title: À la recherche de lecriture oubliee
programme.desc: Après quinze ans denquetes, larcheologue François Desset est parvenu à decoder lelamite lineaire, ecriture millenaire reputee indechiffrable. Recit dune fascinante aventure linguistique.

programme.title: Le mammouth, une resurrection en laboratoire ?
programme.desc: Aux quatre coins du monde, des chercheurs mobilisent des technologies de pointe pour recreer des espèces disparues ou promises à l’extinction. De la resurrection du mammouth au sauvetage du rhinoceros blanc du Nord, focus sur quatre projets en cours.

programme.title: Court-circuit
programme.desc: Depuis "Un chien andalou" (1929) de Luis Buñuel et Salvador Dalí, cinema et surrealisme sont intimement lies. "Court-circuit" vous propose quatre pepites du genre : "Ordinary Life" de Yoriko Mizushiri, "Stone of Destiny" de Julie Cerna, "Symphony n°42" de Reka Busci et "Les possibilites du dialogue" de Jan Svankmajer.

programme.title: 42 - La reponse à presque tout
programme.desc: On a longtemps fait des humains prehistoriques des etres rustres et primitifs. Pour autant, etaient-ils vraiment plus betes que nous ? Si lun dentre eux voyageait dans le temps jusqu’à notre epoque, pourrait-il acquerir toutes les aptitudes des humains d’aujourd’hui ?

programme.title: Premier de corvee
programme.desc: Malgre deux emplois dans la restauration et la livraison, la vie hors des radars dun travailleur clandestin malien. Un documentaire qui raconte par lexemple les luttes des sans-papiers en France, estimes à près de 700 000, pour de meilleures conditions dexistence.

programme.title: Sans-Souci, le palais de Frederic le Grand
programme.desc: Cœur de la Prusse sous Frederic le Grand, le somptueux palais de Sans-Souci a accueilli les penseurs des Lumières, dont Voltaire, et des artistes de renom. Visite guidee dune œuvre dart totale, imaginee par un monarque au pouvoir absolu, philosophe mais aussi redoutable chef de guerre.

programme.title: Medecines dailleurs
programme.desc: Aux Philippines, le "hilot", tradition medicale ancienne, passe par le toucher. Ceux qui pratiquent ce massage, les "manghihilot", ont pour seuls outils leurs mains et de l’huile de noix de coco. Bernard Fontanille rencontre Angelita Calderon, une femme qui soigne les gens du village et les agriculteurs grâce à ses manipulations et sa maîtrise des points de pression.

programme.title: Medecines dailleurs
programme.desc: À La Reunion, les tizanèrs, ces herboristes guerisseurs, incarnent une medecine nourrie d’un lien à la nature.

programme.title: 42 - La reponse à presque tout
programme.desc: Au cours de sa vie, l’etre humain passe jusqu’à six annees à rever. Et si les reves etaient plus que des visions irreelles ? Si nous arrivions à transposer dans la realite les idees geniales apparues en songe ? Les reves recèlent un potentiel creatif largement inexploite à ce jour. Alors, faut-il rever davantage ? Et mieux tirer profit de notre activite onirique ?

programme.title: Crèches, razzia sur les bebes
programme.desc: Depuis l’ouverture des crèches au secteur prive, au debut des annees 2000, la petite enfance fait l’objet d’un juteux business pour ses acteurs voraces. Alors que les scandales de maltraitance et de detournement dargent public se multiplient, enquete sur les derives dune deregulation, qui a transforme les bebes en machines à cash.

programme.title: Crèches, razzia sur les bebes
programme.desc: Après vingt ans de deregulation liberale, de scandales de maltraitance et de detournement dargent public, des gouvernements et des municipalites de plusieurs pays d’Europe tentent de reprendre la main sur le secteur des crèches privees.

programme.title: ARTE Junior, le mag
programme.desc: Des personnes malentendantes ou sourdes, mais aussi celles à louïe parfaite peuvent communiquer merveilleusement grâce à des mouvements des doigts et des mains, ce quon appelle le language des signes. Chaque langue parlee a sa propre langue des signes. On vous explique tout ça dans nos questions reponses avec des elèves de CM1 !

programme.title: 42 - La reponse à presque tout
programme.desc: Aujourdhui, le feu est devenu synonyme de destruction, avec des incendies de plus en plus ravageurs emettant denormes quantites de CO2. De quoi accelerer le derèglement climatique qui, à son tour, favorise les departs de feu. Un cercle vicieux qui a pousse les chercheurs à qualifier notre epoque de "pyrocène".

programme.title: Les bars les plus design dans le monde
programme.desc: DOslo à Tokyo en passant par Johannesburg, des bars et restaurants repensent la convivialite, entre design atypique et atmosphère soignee. Dans cet episode : un bar cache sous un pont de Berlin, un club viennois installe dans la cave de Freud et un rooftop à Bangkok.

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: La jeunesse eternelle : un reve aussi vieux que l’humanite. Naguère lubie de milliardaires californiens, la course à la longevite est desormais une tendance mondiale. Mais peut-on vraiment retarder l’ineluctable ? À quel prix ? Et comment vieillir heureux ? "Twist" part à la rencontre d’artistes et d’intellectuels qui portent chacun un regard different sur le vieillissement.

programme.title: Les nonnes kung-fu : bouddhistes et feministes
programme.desc: Arts martiaux, spiritualite et emancipation feminine : dans un monastère situe sur les hauteurs de Katmandou, une communaute de nonnes est de tous les combats.

programme.title: Cuisines des terroirs
programme.desc: Sur le plateau du Karst, non loin de Trieste, la diversite culturelle s’apprecie jusque dans l’assiette...

programme.title: Les parcs naturels portugais
programme.desc: Tour d’horizon des parcs naturels du Portugal. Dans ce volet : Sintra-Cascais, près de Lisbonne, mele plages idylliques, falaises abruptes et forets brumeuses. Surnommee la "riviera portugaise", la region abrite l’immense dune de Cresmina, en constant mouvement. Menaces par les incendies, les habitants tentent de restaurer les forets et de preserver la biodiversite.

programme.title: Les parcs naturels portugais
programme.desc: Tour d’horizon des parcs naturels du Portugal. Dans ce volet : à quelques kilomètres de la côte atlantique, le parc des Serras de Aire et Candeeiros cache sous ses plateaux arides un immense reseau de cavernes et de grottes. Ce massif calcaire, le plus vaste du pays, recèle des formations spectaculaires et joue un rôle essentiel dans le stockage des eaux souterraines.

programme.title: Les parcs naturels portugais
programme.desc: Tour d’horizon des parcs naturels du Portugal. Dans ce volet : au nord-est du pays, le parc international du Douro seduit par ses gorges spectaculaires et ses falaises abruptes, refuge de plus de 170 espèces d’oiseaux. Berceau de la plus ancienne region viticole du monde, sa vallee abrite des vignobles en terrasses façonnes par des millenaires de traditions.

programme.title: Quand lhistoire fait dates
programme.desc: En denonçant l’invasion de son pays par l’Italie à la tribune de la Societe des nations, le negus d’Éthiopie vient rappeler aux nations leurs engagements et leurs devoirs, au regard du droit international. Mais le cynisme des grandes puissances fait de la crise ethiopienne le laboratoire des renoncements politiques conduisant au pire. Comment enrayer la mecanique ineluctable qui mène à la guerre ?

programme.title: Laigle sest envole
programme.desc: Un commando nazi est charge denlever Winston Churchill. Avec Michael Caine, Donald Sutherland et Robert Duvall.

programme.title: Secrets sauvages du patrimoine
programme.desc: Plante sur un piton rocheux depuis le XIIe siècle, le château du Haut-Kœnigsbourg, en Alsace, a ete le temoin des conflits et des rivalites entre seigneurs, rois et empereurs qui ont emaille cette region tour à tour germanique et française. Ceux qui ont bâti la forteresse, aujourdhui visitee par des milliers de touristes, ont aussi façonne le paysage qui lentoure.

programme.title: Les Alpes bavaroises
programme.desc: Ponctue de nombreuses montagnes et lacs, le pays alpin bavarois jouit d’une image preservee. Pourtant, au cours des dernières decennies, la flore et la faune y ont considerablement souffert de l’exploitation intensive des terres agricoles. Pour tenter d’inverser la tendance, plusieurs initiatives voient desormais le jour.

programme.title: La "folie" de Louis II : Neuschwanstein, le château enchante
programme.desc: Entre genie architectural et feerie kitsch, le château de Neuschwanstein est intimement lie au destin tragique de Louis II de Bavière (1845-1886), le "roi fou". Retour sur l’histoire d’un edifice peuple de reves et de legendes.

programme.title: Golda Schultz, Rolando Villazon et Ludovic Tezier - Château de Neuschwanstein 2025
programme.desc: La Deutsche Kammerphilharmonie de Breme sous la baguette d’Omer Meir Wellber investit le château de Neuschwanstein, dans le sud de l’Allemagne, pour un concert lyrique avec la soprano Golda Schultz, le tenor Rolando Villazon et le baryton Ludovic Tezier. Dans cet edifice grandiose construit par Louis II de Bavière, le prestigieux trio interprète Rossini et Mozart.

programme.title: Karambolage
programme.desc: Voilà un temps fou que notre journaliste allemand Hajo Kruse tenait absolument à presenter à ses compatriotes le mot le plus celèbre de la langue française : merde - Nikola Obermann nous emmène en cuisine pour nous presenter la crème de la crème : la crème fouettee.

programme.title: ARTE Journal
programme.desc: Chaque jour à 19h45, la redaction franco-allemande dARTE Journal propose une approche europeenne et culturelle de lactualite. Un regard original sur le monde.

programme.title: Colette, linsoumise
programme.desc: Avec une fantaisie très Belle Époque, ce documentaire retrace la vie libre et theâtrale de Colette, immense ecrivaine et insatiable hedoniste.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: True Grit est une histoire de vengeance et de courage se passant sur limpitoyable et imprevisible frontière de lOuest americain où la justice est simple et la misericorde est rare. Mattie Ross, est determinee à venger le sang de son père en capturant Tom Chaney, lhomme qui la tue pour deux pièces dor. A tout juste quatorze ans, elle engage Rooster Cogburn , un US Marshall alcoolique pour l’aider à traquer le tueur de son père.

programme.title: Jeff Bridges, star malgre lui
programme.desc: Il a fui les feux de la rampe, avant que "The Dude", figure culte de "The Big Lebowski" des frères Coen, ne le propulse star. Portrait de Jeff Bridges, artiste aux multiples talents et grand acteur en marge des profils hollywoodiens.

programme.title: Penissimo
programme.desc: À la memoire de Jad Turjman Du dieu Priape à la circoncision, en passant par l’extreme virilite incarnee par Schwarzenegger ou Stallone, un drôle de voyage culturel à travers l’histoire du penis, invitant à remettre en question la masculinite contemporaine.

programme.title: Stjepan Hauser joue Bach et Morricone - Château de Neuschwanstein 2025
programme.desc: Au château de Neuschwanstein, en Allemagne, le violoncelliste croate Stjepan Hauser mele les genres aux côtes de l’Orchestre philharmonique de Munich, dirige par le maestro Ulf Schirmer. Le soliste interprète le celèbre "Air sur la corde de sol" de Bach, le thème du "Parrain", signe Ennio Morricone, et la musique de la serie "Game of Thrones", composee par Ramin Djawadi.

programme.title: Le Teatro Amazonas
programme.desc: Inaugure en 1896, lemblematique opera de Manaus en pleine foret amazonienne, dont la construction a repose sur des annees dexploitation des populations indigènes, permet daborder la situation sociale, culturelle et politique du Bresil. À travers les preparatifs de "Peter Grimes" de Benjamin Britten, ce documentaire montre aussi comment le Teatro Amazonas et la musique font vivre Manaus.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Thirteen contestants battle it out to be named 2013s best amateur baker, facing tasks devised by judges Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood. programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: When a passenger is stabbed on the express bus to Honore, Jack and his team are baffled. No-one left their seat, so how on earth did they commit murder?

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: DI Jack Mooney has a fresh mystery to solve when zoo owner Xander Shepherd is killed by a tranquilliser dart in the middle of the grounds. With the park shut to the public at the time, suspicion falls on the victims colleagues - but given they were all in the staff area when the shot was fired, how could any of them have done the deed? Meanwhile, Dwaynes replacement arrives in the shape of new officer Ruby Patterson - who also happens to be the Commissioners niece - and Jack faces a mammoth task when he is signed up to the islands charity swim race

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: The presenter of TV holiday series Hot Shots takes a midnight swim, only for her body to be washed up on the shore. Initial evidence points towards accidental drowning, but Jack is troubled by marks on the victims neck - and as he questions her colleagues, a secret affair, unrequited love and rocky working relationships convince the DI that this was no accident. With Florence away on a romantic weekend, JP steps up to help the DI with the case, and with the tourist board up in arms about the crime, Commissioner Selwyn keeps a close eye on the investigation

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: In the wake of his fathers death, Benedict Dacre rules the roost at the Paradise Skies Coffee plantation - but all is not plain sailing. DI Jack Mooney and the team must navigate the tempestuous waters of a family divided. Elsewhere Ruby is settling in well and reveals to JP that she was once arrested, much to his horror. Has she put her own job at risk?

programme.desc: Its Halloween, and Toad boasts of having a ghost in Toad Hall. His friends go to see if its true, but it turns out to be an elaborate hoax. Or is it?

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: The weasels hear of Toad’s fear of scarecrows and use this to frighten Toad out of Toad Hall for good.

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: When Toad accidentally injures Smudge, the weasels prey on his good nature to get into Toad Hall to convalesce. Nurse Toad, though, proves to be too much even for the wily weasels.

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: Ratty tries to teach Mole, Hedge and Toad the rules of poetry but loses Hedges poem in the strong wind. Can he and Hedge retrieve it or Mole and Toad remember it before it gets destroyed or forgotten?

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the tablet. During their scuffle, they knock over an army crate which falls into the middle of the bamboo forest surrounding the cabin.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create a shadow puppet show where seven papercut lemmings confront a bear over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: As Grizzy relaxes in the massage chair, a cloud drifts in front of the sun, immediately stopping the electricity supply in the log cabin.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy dismantles the toboggan built by the Lemmings in the log cabin and reemploys the bamboo sticks to build a jacuzzi.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a drone race throughout the cabin. Grizzy, who was on the verge of falling asleep, interrupts the competition but must contend with the rodents reprisals. Thrown out of the cabin, the bear falls onto a temple dedicated to the Monkey King. He appropriates the statues powers, operating a magic cloud by remote control. Grizzy settles in on the cloud and wins the race before the Lemmings. But a cloud that flies that fast can only arouse lust...

programme.title: SuperThings: Rivals of Kaboom - Kazoom Power
programme.desc: Kai, Finn, and Mia transform into Kazoom Kids and are called upon by Enigma to save Kaboom City from the threat of a great villain.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Ma and Pa Bear to build a bedroom for their son, Junior, whose excitement causes setbacks.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When The Looney Builders help Wile E. Coyote build a telescope to view the Looney Moon, Tweety must face his fear of the dark. / The Looney Builders are hired by Mayor Leghorn to build the venue for the Looney Games. They soon become overwhelmed by the job and must ask for help.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi and Batwing must work together to get past the Legion of Zoom in order to deliver a new giant screen to Batcomputer.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling insecure about his size after a game of Hide-And-Seek, Buff uses the shrink belt belonging to The Atom and accidentally shrinks himself down to the size of a mouse!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Velmas got an interview at the prestigious Kingston University the most selective school in the country. The only catch? The dean wants her and the rest of the Scooby gang to figure out why the ghost of Elias Kingston the schools founder is haunting Kingstons book-filled halls!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne brings the Gang to a Victorian murder mystery party so they can dress up and solve a fake mystery for once.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wicket’s flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean turns superhero in an attempt to outwit a cunning cat burglar.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van but ends up serving himself – along with every kid in town.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The frogspawn in Beans bathroom begin hatching, and before long the house is full of angry amphibians - just as the mayor is about to arrive for tea.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is invited to lunch at the stately home of an aristocratic lady who isnt all she seems. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: It’s the night of the Big Dance, and Skinny has some serious moves ready to go. Shame we’ll never get to see them; Skinny practices so hard that he renders himself unconscious. Luckily Skinny has a guardian angel in the form of a morphing orange blob. Lamput tries everything to wake Skinny back up, but nothing works; Lamput is gonna have to go above and beyond. Skinny (still out cold) shows up to the dance in a bright orange suit that seems to have a life of its own, and proceeds to tear up the dancefloor. When Skinny finally comes to, he finds out he was the hit of the big dance. Skinny walks off with the trophy and the gal. No-one thinks to thank lil’ Lamput. For a sworn enemy, this blob sure is a good friend.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Mr. Moustache is on a romantic date with Miss Lipstick during Loi Krathong festival (the famous annual Thailands light festival), an event that nothing must go wrong! However, the Docs and their chase with Lamput keeps getting in the way of the the lovers perfect night out.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After a beautiful start to a beautiful day, a sudden storm cuts the fun short and the Docs have to go home. Lamput accidentally gets taken home with them. As always, Lamput makes himself at home. No one is the wiser until the next morning. It’s time for Skinny and Specs to go into full on detective mode and to find out who or what is in their house. Can Lamput make a run for it before they find him?

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: An old metal box found by chance in a recess of a cliff brings back childhood memories for Grizzy and the Lemmings.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: How can one peacefully watch a documentary on salmon fish, nice and comfy on the sofa, when the Lemmings are playing chemistry novices with a fun experiment box?

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzys TV remote control is stolen by a partridge who collects high-tech objects in his nest perched high up in a tree. This is a case of absolute urgency!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has got it into his head to offer a butterfly to the she bear hes in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens hes spotted.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have discovered an addictive new game based on the astonishing bouncing properties of the rangers new running shoes. Grizzy, who is trying to relax, confiscates the shoes and soon realizes they are far more comfortable than his thongs.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy babysits for the she-bear he has a crush on. Theres no question of Grizzy tripping up for he has no intention of taking any risks! But he hadnt reckone

programme.desc: When Hildie receives another dozen black roses from a secret admirer, her curiosity is piqued. programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick has taken up painting to help him relax.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Unable to sleep because of the incessant barking from a dog somewhere in the city, Tom and Jerry must track down the noisy mutt. programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After Rick and Ginger install a high-tech, state-of-the-art home security system, Tom and Jerrys shenanigans activate the homes automation system. Using the system against each other, they quickly lose control and the house shuts them down.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean chases a thief who stole an artwork from the National Gallery.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Whos afraid of silent movies about killer cats, alien blobs, and little men dancing in sugar bowls? Mr Bean. He is very scared. A trip to the cinema sends his imagination running wild.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Bean’s plan seems to be working – until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irma’s admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But it’s not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Bean’s home – eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is stuck in a lift and starts to annoy the other passengers.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: It is a nice sunny day and Mr. Bean and Mrs. Wicket are relaxing in the garden, Mr. Bean attempts to sit beside her in the cool shade of her outdoor umbrella but Mrs. Wicket refuses. He decides to design his own umbrella for himself and Teddy. As he starts digging, he discovers - to his surprise - a bomb. He tries to disarm it, unfortunately, his attempt only accelerates its countdown.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in a trance – barks like a dog and starts to dance.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean builds a car washing machine that attracts all manner of customers.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is wracked with guilt after he chases Scrapper and ends up with a flattened cat.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean plays gooseberry when Mrs Wicket falls in love with a man Mr Bean doesn’t trust.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs pursue Lamput across a vast desert. Things go wrong and all three end up stranded with no way to call for help. Stuck with each other, the trio roam the desert as days turn into years and the Docs grow old. One day, they find a map that leads to a Fountain of Youth and a way out of the desert, but can they survive the journey across the harsh, sand sea?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs finally catch Lamput! Mission accomplished…and now they have nothing to do. Every other job to catch lab experiments gone rogue is a piece of cake compared to Lamput. Realizing that they’ve lost their lives’ purpose, Specs and Skinny decide to break Lamput out of the lab’s hi-tech prison so that they can go back to catching him again.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its Specs big night in the town with the lady of his dream. What could go wrong? The answer to that question might have do with the shapeshifting orange blob at the next table.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After a mishap involving a bucket of grey paint, Lamput ends up back at the Lab, working undercover as the newest Doc on the block.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When The Looney Builders build Taz a wrecking ball vehicle, he struggles to learn how to operate it.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders face underwater challenges as they build a sea school for Moxie Manatee.

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers’ market with Irma at her knitwear stall – right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but can’t afford it. When he visits a food truck that’s laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Animated antics. Mrs. Wicket thwarts Mr. Beans plans to watch his favourite TV show.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around – yum! But he’s told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artist’s studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time he’s let in, but will Bean’s fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal – revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and he’ll get a month’s rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout… doing all Mr Bean’s work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When invited to dinner by Mr Bean it’s probably best to take your own sandwiches.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The nasty tennis player is big and angry and wants his ball back. The one Mr. Bean managed to throw on the roof of a house across the road.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: In a trampoline park, Bean competes in a race with a boy. The winner gets Teddy. Will Bean and Teddy be separated forever?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is struggling to sell items from her knitwear stall at the market, so sends Mr Bean to collect a sheep costume he can wear to attract customers. Once at the fancy dress shop however, Mr Bean gets stuck in the sheep costume and has to travel back to the market wearing it. Things go from bad to worse when Mr Bean takes a short cut across the field and gets caught up in a flock of real sheep!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean spots a rare book - the Teddy Bear Haunting - in a bookshop, but it’s too expensive to buy. He secretly tries to read it in the shop… until he’s thrown out. To his dismay someone else then buys the book – so he follows the buyer around trying to read over his shoulder. Will Mr Bean manage to get to the end of the book before getting spotted?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are enjoying a day at the arcade, when Mr Bean gets carried away with the dance machine, knocking Teddy onto the floor. Teddy’s picked up, put on a trolley of stuffed toys and figurines – and soon enough, he’s been put in the claw machine as a prize! Mr Bean has run out of coins, so has to find a way of winning Teddy back without looking like he’s cheating!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are looking forward to seeing a once-in-a-lifetime comet – but it won’t appear until 4am! He tries to stay up, but it’s useless – he keeps dropping off. So instead, Mr Bean decides to go to bed and set an alarm – yet he over-winds the clock and it breaks! With all the shops closed, his only option is to build his own complicated version to make sure he doesn’t miss the comet…

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket makes Mr Bean drive her to the hospital to get her ingrown toenail seen to and asks him to wait. Mr Bean gets bored, and on a wander around the hospital he finds a spare doctor’s outfit with stethoscope – great Teddy - I’ll give you a check-up! But a nurse spots him, and thinking he’s a new doctor Mr Bean is asked to visit patients. How long can he keep it up before he’s found out?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Eating too many sweets gives Bean a terrible toothache, and when all other attempts at curing it are exhausted, he reluctantly visits the dreaded dentist.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After (accidentally) rescuing a kitten from a tree Mr. Bean is set to have his picture in the newspaper!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean makes his own horror movie and ropes in Mrs Wicket as the star!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wicket’s goldfish but Scrapper the cat is keen to ‘help’.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes ‘man overboard’ and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean hopes to win some cash prizes at the funfair but it’s not as easy as it seems!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees her electricity bill, but he has a back-up idea - a wind turbine. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean attempts to retrieve his cash card and "accidently" ends up inside a bank vault.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own ‘No Littering’ signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: SuperThings: Rivals of Kaboom - Kazoom Power
programme.desc: Mia and Kai have to infiltrate Enigma’s base, taken over by the villains, to get it back and access the super computer.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a casing that fell from a circus caravan, the Lemmings find a magic stick that can enchant objects and make them come alive.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Whilst trying to stop the Lemmings from playing with a crate of firework rockets Grizzy is literally carried away with them when the largest specimen shoots off

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: With their endless battles over the rangers cabin which they do not want to share Grizzy and the Lemmings end up blowing the cabin up.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. The bear makes a fabulous rodeo partner, he just needs enough ice to keep cool. Even a few ice cubes on his head are enough. The only obstacle to this beautiful friendship is Grizzy, who considers himself master of the fridge and thus of the cabins ice production.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks, which he immediately clears out of the cabin, his enemies stuck to it like stickers. What he doesnt know, is that the trunk contains a multifunction drone, complete with joystick and virtual reality headset, which enables "embedded" piloting. Thanks to this cutting-edge technology, the Lemmings decide to regain control of the situation!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a strange pond in an American Indian grotto that has the power to rejuvenate anyone who dips in it. They spray a bit of the water of youth onto Grizzy and he instantly turns into a harmless cub they can easily rid themselves of. But the effects of the waters are only temporary.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are so obsessed with catching Lamput that even in their dreams, the chase goes on. It’s really not a restful sleep, when you keep waking up sweating from horrid visions that, let’s face it, just remind you what a nightmare your day job is. The Docs make the brave decision to see a therapist about these terrible dreams. In the waiting room is the last orange blob they wanted to see; apparently a life of hot pursuit is taking its toll on Lamput, too. The shrink will have to resort to some very unconventional treatments.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: A sneaky trick strands the Batwheels at the docks, clearing the way for a Batcave heist by the Legion of Zoom. It’s up to MOE to stop the Zoomers with zany improvised tricks and traps with a little help from Ace and Batcomputer.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Penguins Ducky Boat becomes the fastest vehicle in Gotham.

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.desc: After he causes the Batwing to crash, Bam becomes obsessed with making it up to her during a high-stakes aerial mission against Penguin and his giant ducky blimp.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Marvin the Martian hires The Looney Builders to build a doghouse on Mars for his puppy, K-9.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.desc: Tom is mistakenly placed in a shelter for homeless animals and forced to join the shelters rock-n-roll while Jerry lives the life of Riley back home.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The gang are determined to make Rick and Ginger change their mind about downsizing and moving to the big city by making it impossible to sell the house.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A lineage check determines that Spike is descended from British aristocracy.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is tricked into believing he is invisible.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: When Space Junk smashes into their clubhouse, Ella and Slippy set off to fix the problem. While Ella wants to be rid of the junk, Slippy’s determined to reuse or at least recycle it. When Ella is trapped, re-using space junk may be the only way to save her!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: The gang is playing tag the Meteoroid when Glitch fails to follow Slippys instruction. He soon realises its because Glitch saw the comet hes been tracking for months!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Ella and Slippy are perfecting their triple corkscrews when Priya, Ella’s best friend from Earth, surprises her with a visit. Priya performs a perfect triple corkscrew to everyone’s amazement. Ella is frustrated that she still can’t seem to nail it.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: While playing ice hockey on Europa, an ice-covered moon of Jupiter, a stray puck hits Ella’s wrist and injures Maggie. Dad is sure he can fix her but will need palladium so he can fuse her fried circuits back together before she loses her memory.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Slippy wants to watch an eclipse so badly that he makes special safety goggles for himself and his friends. But Ella has a different plan. When she insists on going to watch a binary star supernova, Slippy opts out and heads off on his own.

programme.desc: Kingfisher is singing a very irritating song, to everyone’s annoyance. Only Chief Weasel appreciates the song because he can use it to get Tinker and Smudge to obey him. But will Kingfisher now ever be able to leave the Wild Woods?

programme.desc: Mole is making his winter supply of jam, but its Portlys birthday, and Mole very generously gives everyone a jar of jam to give to Portly for a birthday present. Soon he has none left for winter. And Portly has rather a lot of jam!

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: Its the Midsummer Festival, and everyone is contributing to it, with Badger as the master of ceremonies, the Jack of the Green. But when he finds himself trapped in his own home, how can the festival start?

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: Mole is making his winter supply of jam, but its Portlys birthday, and Mole very generously gives everyone a jar of jam to give to Portly for a birthday present. Soon he has none left for winter. And Portly has rather a lot of jam!

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: Its the Midsummer Festival, and everyone is contributing to it, with Badger as the master of ceremonies, the Jack of the Green. But when he finds himself trapped in his own home, how can the festival start?

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: Everyone is too busy to play with Toad so he foolishly opens the lock gates in order to propel his new boat. But this creates a giant wave that demolishes the Otters’ holt downstream. Toad must now repair their home, finding help from an unexpected quarter.

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: Toad installs a new Mauss security system to protect Toad Hall from the weasels, but Toads arrogance and rudeness towards Mauss leaves Toad locked out of Toad Hall for good. Only a big, mouse-sized apology can put things right.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: To trick Grizzys vigilance and steal the TV, the Lemmings, disguised as traditional Chinese dancers, perform a number that leaves the bear flabbergasted. The rodents take advantage of their diversion to carry off the TV set on their airborne craft made of Chinese umbrellas. But before they can escape with their bounty, Grizzy recovers the screen. Ever as determined, the Lemmings come back after upgrading their vessel.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Annoyed by a noisy high-speed chase between the Lemmings and a raccoon, Grizzy abruptly stops the game. The players fall into empty space and land in a clearing.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: On the way back from a fishing outing, Grizzy unwittingly brings back an electrode that controls a robot. Once activated, the gadget puts itself in the service of the bear, satisfying his each and every need. The envious Lemmings plot to take possession of this new metallic ally. They manage to evict the bear, who does not intend to take this lying down… especially when he discovers a pair of robotic arms hidden in a module that fell out of the robot!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: At nightfall, just as Grizzy starts to doze off, a racket comes from outside the cabin: the Lemmings are sliding along the Great Wall in a crate, propelled by firework rockets. Cleverly avoiding the bears strategies to stop them, the Lemmings accidentally set off a mechanism in a tower. A secret room filled with cannons and catapults opens, just waiting to be used by the powder monkey apprentices…

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread in the cabin and it ends up sinking in the lagoon. The bear makes a diving suit from various home facilities, while the Lemmings share a diving tank to put a wrench in their adversarys flippers! But the local wildlife comes to meet them.

programme.title: SuperThings: Rivals of Kaboom - Kazoom Power
programme.desc: The Kazoom Kids are getting to know Kaboom City when they get their first mission: to save Super C from Jack the Juicer.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Gossamer extends a camping trip invitation to the Looney Builders; their plans for a basic campsite shift when Daffy convinces the group to experience glamping instead.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build Marvin the Martian and his Martian crew a space station. / The Looney Builders redesign the final hole of ACME Acres Mini Golf Course, and Porky is determined to get it just right for the kids.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: The Batwheels take on a new vehicular villain who keeps growing bigger and bigger, while learning that size doesnt always win the day.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird struggles to stop Poison Ivys diabolical schemes because he wants to be in the spotlight. But when he needs to use the bat-o-flage and become invisible, he’ll have to learn that doing good is its own reward.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred gets a call for help from Chuck, his daredevil of a best friend, leading the gang on a rescue mission deep in the caverns of an ancient civilization.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Its Scoobys dream come true as the gang visits the set of his favorite TV show and he meets the star, his celebrity crush, a dog actress who plays a detective on the screen. Now all Scooby has to do is work up the courage to actually talk to her while also solving the mystery of the monstrous Gargoyle attacking the production!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isn’t invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party – even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean digs a hole in his garden - and finds a bomb!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean’s pizzas are a huge success with everyone – well almost everyone.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: How does one choose tasteful wallpaper these days? After watching a royal documentary on TV, Mr. Bean decides to decorate his room in the style of Buckingham Palace. If the Queen’s new wallpaper is good enough for Her Royal Highness, then it’s going to be good enough for him. Meanwhile, his landlady, Mrs. Wicket, suffers from illusions of grandeur and crowns herself Queen of the street.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself in a race to grow a giant marrow with his next-door neighbour. There’s prize money at stake and a chance to get his photo in the papers. And so, as the competition gets tough, Bean’s gardening techniques become more ingenious, unconventional and desperate.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput takes refuge in a fancy hotel. Specs and Skinny bluff their way past the doorman by acting like they come from the expensive side of the tracks. Spoiler: they don’t.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs pursue Lamput across a vast desert. Things go wrong and all three end up stranded with no way to call for help. Stuck with each other, the trio roam the desert as days turn into years and the Docs grow old. One day, they find a map that leads to a Fountain of Youth and a way out of the desert, but can they survive the journey across the harsh, sand sea?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs finally catch Lamput! Mission accomplished…and now they have nothing to do. Every other job to catch lab experiments gone rogue is a piece of cake compared to Lamput. Realizing that they’ve lost their lives’ purpose, Specs and Skinny decide to break Lamput out of the lab’s hi-tech prison so that they can go back to catching him again.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the rangers brand new and apparently burglar proof safe.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is impressed by the TV show of a magician who transforms a partridge into a bouquet of flowers.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: On a very hot day, an ice cream commercial awakes the desire of Grizzy.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have discovered a truly wild new game: an augmented reality program on the rangers digital tablet.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The only edible food item left in the rangers cabin is a gorgeous salmon, which is stuck inside a block of ice at the back of the freezer compartment.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have unearthed a box filled with birthday fountains of light that spit forth giant bursts of sparks.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger accidentally backs her car over Butchs tail. Feeling awful, she brings the alley cat into her home until hes feeling better. Butch is finally getting what hes wanted, much to Toms chagrin, especially now that Gingers having him take care of the poor injured cat. Jerry revels in the situation until he realizes that two idiot cats are more trouble than one and Jerrys getting his butt whooped. Now Jerry must prove that Butch is rehabilitated in order to return him to the alley where he belongs and return his life.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Hildie is mixing a batch of foot balm thatll soften and beautify her gnarly-looking feet. She has Tom rub it in, nice and good. Unfortunately, the foot balm is a little too strong and makes her foot disappear. Hildies recipe may be a foot balm bomb but it gives Tom a good idea. Hell use it to "vanish" into thin air. Jerry literally doesnt know what hit him when the invisible cat bats him around like a ball of yarn. Tom is unaware when the effects begin to wear off and Jerry is able to defend himself. When Jerry gets a hold of the cream, its his turn to have the upper hand. A battle of the vanishing cream ensues, each using it in various ways to outwit the other.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its Toms wedding day! Hes getting married to Toodles in a backyard wedding that were experiencing through the eyes of his best friend, Jerry. Puuuuurfeeecttt in every way, then the crap hits the mouse hole: Tom is given Jerry as a wedding gift. When it cant possibly get worse Jerry wakes up and tosses Toodles out of the house!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry is left alone in an empty house after Rick, Ginger and Tom are nowhere to be seen.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry brings Tom to consciousness. His partner has an aluminum bat on his head, arrow in his butt, bee stings on his arm, tire treads on his back, lipstick on his cheek and a terrible case of amnesia. Jerry must help Tom use the investigative clues on his body to solve what happened. The clues will take them to some destinations that may leave Tom more physically abused than when he started but in better mental shape (as each stop causes a little more memory to return).

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: We open on a SOLD sign in front of what will be Rick and Gingers house. Inside, the house is empty – no Rick, no Ginger, no Tom, no furniture. Just Jerry, who slip slides merrily across the bare floors – the place all to himself. That is until the front door opens and Rick and Ginger arrive in their new home. Ginger screams having just seen a mouse and tells Rick to get Tom out of the moving van. Like most cats in a new place, Tom doesnt want to come out from beneath the recently placed couch, but Ginger demands he catch that mouse! And so we watch the beginning of a lifelong adversarial relationship unfold one gag at a time!

programme.desc: Romance is in the air and Beans girlfriend is determined to have a piece of it.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: An escaped prisoner suffers hard labour under Mrs Wicket while Mr Bean puts his feet up in jail.

programme.desc: Mr Bean takes trick or treating to the next level in a war with his next-door neighbours!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: Lamput

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean discovers being in hospital isnt always a bed of roses.

No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their ‘relaxing’ holiday!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series

Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Road Rage
programme.desc: A mum defends her kid from a group of bikers. A deranged driver repeatedly rams another motorist. A driver defends himself from aggressive motorists.

programme.title: Road Rage
programme.desc: A group of women gets into a gigantic brawl in a Florida intersection. A motorcycle causes a massive accident. A man ploughs through a parade route.

programme.title: Border Control Italia
programme.desc: Follows the officers of the Security and Customs Services at the borders of Italy, which are under the constant threat from drugs, weapons, and suspected terrorists.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike tracks down a racy Gardner Douglas Mark 3 AC Cobra with only 800 miles on the clock. But Edd needs to make it green to make it legal; will he need to buy a new engine?

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Michael and Maria Start restore an unusual 1950s football arcade game. Michael works on the mechanics and Maria knits jerseys for all the players.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: More everyday items go under the microscope with a look at how objects including car tyres, scuba tanks and silk are manufactured.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: More everyday items go under the microscope. How are rock crushers, cake sprinkles and steam irons made?

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: A look at where materials come from and how manufacturing processes have developed over the years, featuring detachable IndyCar steering wheels, mixed salad and wind turbines.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: More everyday items are put under the microscope, looking at how blast doors, lipstick, artificial palm trees and brass plaques are made.

programme.title: American Chopper
programme.desc: OCC has their work cut out for them with two new projects, a B-2 Bomber bike for Northrop Grumman and another for the NHL. The companys foundation is rocked as Paul Sr. and Paul Jr. go head to head in a no-holds-barred argument.

programme.title: Asphalt Cowboys
programme.desc: The big day has finally arrived: trucker Mike and his girlfriend Bianca are getting married. Meanwhile, Thorsten has to deal with a broken down truck.

programme.title: The Autobahn A2
programme.desc: One of Europes busiest, most dangerous and most important highways. For many people its their place of work, and many more use it to travel across Europe.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: Derek and his brother Sean head back to their family farm in North Dakota. They dig out a 1971 Chevrolet Chevelle sedan that has a waterlogged engine.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: Derek finds himself a 1950 Ford 8N tractor. But with a cracked engine block, Derek will have to revisit his farming routes to make this implement operational.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Drew enlists automaton restorers Michael and Maria to get an automaton archer firing again. Karyn wants Ted and Robin to save an iconic K6 telephone box.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Metalworker Ted works his magic on a rusty old mining cart. Martin restores a pair of Civil War era military boots, and Steve and Gill save a broken antique table.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: The Browns must navigate the treacherous Wrangell Narrows on course for the storied Mosman Island where Bird hopes to begin a new chapter. But with the clock ticking for Noah to find his homestead, stormy seas threaten their journey.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: Noah must complete a tricky barter to secure an ideal Alaskan home. Back on Mosman Island, the emotion of the Alaskan trip takes its toll on Rain.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Mine Rescue with Freddy And Juan
programme.desc: Freddy and Juan rescue a British Columbia miner on his final season without a miracle. Their search for new ground leads to shocking results.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: A rookie miner gets trapped down a mine shaft. A dust storm forces the Blacklights to reluctantly return to the failed Land of Promise money pit.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Dreaming of living near a mountain resort, a Colorado couple searches for a tiny home close to skiing and hiking. Will they be able to sacrifice some modern conveniences for the location of their dreams?

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: A one-time restaurateur decides to start a new business and new life in Asheville, N.C., where she searches for a modern tiny home with enough room to entertain guests on a budget of $50,000.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown
programme.desc: Josh finds coins from an epic pirate treasure. He leaps into the frigid North Atlantic to recover the riches of feared pirate, Henry Avery.

programme.title: Mystery At Blind Frog Ranch
programme.desc: As the crew explore the cavern, they are overcome by a deadly and invisible gas cloud. Itll take a complicated rescue mission to get them out alive.

programme.title: NASAs Unexplained Files
programme.desc: Astronomers find evidence for alien technology around a distant star. Then, pictures of Pluto show that something might be moving across its surface, and Apollo astronauts see something inexplicable as they approach the moon.

programme.title: Naked And Afraid
programme.desc: A mother of three and a jungle savvy Green Beret take on the remote wetland of Guyana, but it remains to be seen whether or not they will be up to the task.

programme.title: Naked And Afraid
programme.desc: A nurturing mother, and an independent adventurer try to survive in the rainforests of Nicaragua. Can they conquer two weeks Naked and Afraid?

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars
