programme.desc: Snow comes early to the Island of Sodor – and it is heavier than usual! Donald and Douglas are coupled back-to-back with a van between their tenders and snowploughs on their fronts. Donald and Douglas keep squabbling about which line they should clear first, culminating in a big argument. Donald pulls away hard, snapping a damaged coupling and moving away with Douglas’s tender! So Douglas is left behind in the snow – without coal or water! The time apart helps cool the brothers’ tempers. They are delighted to be reunited in the end – and share water and coal from their tenders. Brothers!

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Imagination Adventure: Sheriff Caillou and Deputy Clementine thwart Leo the Bandits train Robbery.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou wants a new video game and does chores to earn an allowance. But they all go a bit wrong.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: Forgetful Mayor Fox has misplaced the giant key to the city that hes supposed to be presenting to a visiting astronaut. Huckle and his pals try to figure out where he set it down. They learn that Mayor Fox did one thing while touring a candy factory that required both his hands - stirring a huge pot of candy goo. Not far away they find a big chocolate-covered key./When Busytown residents are baffled by mysterious door knocking, Huckle and gang discover who it is.

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Monkey wants to build himself a new house, when the first try doesnt end well he decides to use rocks. To his big surprise one of these rocks turns out to be no other then his friend Turtle! Well, a visit from a friend is always a good reason to play Monkey’s favorite game… “Monkey See Monkey Do”!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: A hunt for dinosaur bones leads to a search and rescue mission with the Police Helicopter, FireSwift, Radar and Shadow!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: As Norman leaves the house, the giant hat he made for the Pontypandy Hat Parade gets stuck in the door, just as the sitting room goes up in flames!

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Meera orders an extra-special teddy for her baby brother Nik and his teddy bears picnic.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Scoutbadger has been invited to sleep over at Martis’s home and, for once, has to ask his father for permission instead of asking Margaret as he usually does. However, Margaret is not there today and Edmund is in a very bad mood.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Rosie would like to spend a night alone, without Berry. Edmund and Margaret suggest that she sleeps, just for one night, in the guest room. Berry is not happy about this and asks her brothers for help.

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: What is the most extraordinary magical creature that can be met in a fairy tale: Doodleboo has his idea, and to please his friends, he will make them a pretty Riddleboo!

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: Sketcky drew the plan of the castle of his dreams. Bubble wants his room to be in the dungeon. Sketcky does not understand why, but Doodleboo will point it out to him.

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: For Christmas, Sketcky wonders how Santa Claus could give so many gifts. Thanks to Doodleboo, he will know who is very useful to Santa Claus.

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave play a spot the difference game, looking for the odd one out in groups of things. By looking very carefully, Dave manages to spot all the different shapes, sizes and colours.

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave become The Special Delivery Crew, delivering parcels to their animal friends. They discover the importance of reading the pictorial labels correctly, to work out whom each parcel is for and where they live.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare is disappointed when a trail of ants disappears with the delicious Spring berries he’s found. He’s convinced that ants are not very nice, and only after Big Nutbrown Hare explains how the ants were probably taking the berries home to their families does Little Nutbrown Hare forgive them. And when he sees how clever the ants are, he soon wants to be like them.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: The Summer meadow is home to a many amazing treasures of nature. When Little Nutbrown Hare finds a beautiful blue butterfly, he and Little Field Mouse go on a hunt for other blue treasures to bring back and show Big Nutbrown Hare, including blueberries, blue bells and even blue eggshells. Meanwhile, Big Nutbrown Hare has discovered the biggest blue treasure of them all. What could it be?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare wakes early one Summer morning before the sun has risen. Big Nutbrown Hare sends Little Nutbrown Hare off to invite his friends for breakfast so he can rest a little longer. Along the way Little Nutbrown Hare discovers how wonderful and different all his friends homes are. Will Little Nutbrown Hare still love his own home as much as he did?

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Charlie is coming to play and Bing has planned lots of things for them to do. But when Charlie arrives he doesn’t want to play any of the games Bing has put out. Bing is upset until Flop suggests they watch to see what Charlie really wants to do. Charlie heads straight for the kitchen where he, and Bing, have a great time making music with pots and pans.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop see Pando skateboarding and Bing wants a go but its a lot harder than it looks and Bing falls off. Pando finds a clever way to help Bing get his confidence back.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: At Ammas crèche a butterfly lands on Sulas painting. Bing tries to help it go outside but accidentally squishes it. Flop and Amma help the sad children say goodbye.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: The playful rabbit wants to draw a big picture, so Flop finds him some chalk to create a stripy, spotty, zig-zag dinosaur on the pavement

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula find a potato in Amma’s vegetable patch with a comical ‘face’, so they take it under their wing, naming it “Nosey”. The two children look after Nosey and show him around the crèche but unfortunately Nosey goes down the slide too quickly and his ‘nose’ falls off. Amma shows them how to plant both bits of potato so that they can grow new potatoes.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: On a rainy day, Dollys house gets flooded. When the rain stops, Stanley, the stag beetle, repairs the roof. Berry also helps Dolly, who is upset about her soaked drawings. Berry visits Raymond, the copper beetle, who has plenty of bells. He asks for two special bells to cheer Dolly up. At home, he makes coconut balls and later delivers them to Dolly along with the bells, which make her very happy. Later, Berry paints over the stain caused by the rain, and Dolly repaints the pictures with the help of Flutter and Leapy. The bells bring joy to the house.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Flutter, the butterfly girl, catches a cold on a gloomy, rainy day. Doctor Owl examines her and advises her to rest a lot in bed. Her friends visit often to take care of her, and Flutter always asks them to read from her new book. Soon, everyone knows the story, which tells of a ball held in a splendid castle. One day, Balthazar makes Flutter sad by saying that the princess story is just a fairy tale. Flutter turns away, disappointed, and falls asleep. Balthazar meets Doctor Owl, who notices that something is bothering him.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Mama Owls chicks are born, and soon they are strong enough for Berry and Dolly to visit them. Doctor Owl asks for their help while he works. The owl babies are very lively, and Berry and Dolly play with them enthusiastically and patiently. At lunchtime, Mama Owl is running out of patience, but eventually, they manage to feed the chicks. After finishing lunch and resting a little, the little ones regain their energy. They happily jump around Mama Owl, who feels it is time that the chicks learn to fly.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Alfonso, the cricket, plays beautifully on his violin for the forest inhabitants, but one day, no one listens to his new piece. First, he looks for Berry, Balthazar, and Stanley, but they are busy. He goes to Dolly, but she doesn’t have time either. Very discouraged, he decides to leave the forest. However, he meets the Magpie, who welcomes him and cheers him up. Meanwhile, the others begin to search for Alfonso. When they find him, they apologize and invite him to play his new piece at the playground opening.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: A mysterious giant circle appears in the middle of a corn field. Although Pig Will and Pig Won’t are convinced it’s the landing site of an alien flying saucer, Huckle puts the clues together and ultimately goes up in a hot air balloon to reveal the flattened area is actually Vincent Van Goat’s latest artistic endeavor./When flying potatoes are dropping from the sky in Busytown, Huckle and gang are determined to find out why.

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Trying to see as much of the beautiful savanna’s view as possible; Monkey climbs higher and higher up the tree. At this height there is only one friend Monkey can meet… the Giraffe is ready and willing to play Monkey’s favorite game Monkey see Monkey Do.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: While taking her class on a tour of the airport, Mrs Chen accidentally lifts off in FireSwift and it’s up to Norman to use his gaming skills to control the aircraft until the Rescue Team arrives!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: The Pontypandy Pioneers bake up a storm to earn their baking badge, but when a greasy oven bursts into flames, its time to call the rescue team!

programme.title: Kipper
programme.desc: There’s a thump on Kipper’s front door. When he opens it, there’s a ball. But it’s not an ordinary ball as Kipper soon finds out – it seems to have a life of its own, and Arnold has great fun with it when no-one is looking.

programme.title: Kipper
programme.desc: Kipper and Tiger go to the stream and play with their paper boats. They decide playing pirates and building a raft is more exciting. Soon they find themselves marooned on an island in the stream….but luckily Pig is there to save them.

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: While looking for a lost toy under a bunch of crates, Nina and T’choupi discover some very strange hairs belonging to some unidentified animal … In a mystery, the two friends head off to inspect all the animals of the hamlet in an attempt to track down the owner of the strange fur... But a big surprise awaits them…!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: Blindfolded, T’choupi is having the time of his life playing Blind Man’s Bluff with Nina and Luce!... Until he falls over… right in the nettles! Owieee! His parents tend to his little booboo, but he’s not so keen to play all of a sudden - he’s scared he’ll fall in the nettles again! When his parents spur him on, T’choupi gives in and resumes playing. But his motivation has been dampened: now he’s scared of everything!... But wait, T’choupi’s no scaredy-cat, and he’s gonna prove it!!

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam and Julia dream of seeing snow falling in the yard of the Mouse Mansion. They decide to do everything they can to make this happen. But such a thing is not so simple, as they will find out!

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse whos long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: While Tilda is having a picnic by the river with her friends, Snaily creeps into the garden to look for food. He sees another snail that has fallen asleep on the wall of the house and is threatening to dry out. Courageously, Snaily saves the other snail, but in doing so gets trapped under a bucket.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: 24 days seem like a very long wait until Christmas. But the Triplets may have an idea to speed up time. What if they ate all the chocolates from their Christmas calendar at once? Of course, Mom is not happy and warns them: they had better be good, because Santa is watching and doesn’t bring gifts to kids who do not behave! Oh no, they only have three weeks to make up for a whole year of silly things!

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: Shh! Let’s not wake up Mom! Today is her birthday and the Triplets have decided to prepare her a surprise: a nice cake with a poem and a beautiful necklace! But it is easier said than done and the kitchen is soon covered in flour and cocoa powder. They eventually decide for a breakfast in bed. After all their efforts they discreetly go into Mom’s room with the tray. But suddenly, Bang! The entire homemade breakfast falls on Mom’s bed. What a great way to start the day…

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Pico and Rosie do not agree with the day’s plans made by their respective families. Pico dreams of having some independence while Rose wants calm and attention. They decide to change places.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Billy is put in charge of Clementine, Leo and Caillou for five minutesat the beach. How much adventure could they get into? Well, thanks to asurf-obsessed Caillou, a lost hair clip, and a rogue seagul... Quite alot!

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou and his family head out on Grandpas boat for theafternoon, but in Caillous mind theyre crossing treacherous seasin pursuit of pirate treasure!

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: Toby stubbornly refuses to fill up with coal just because Henrietta keeps reminding him. He leaves her behind and sets off to take some trucks to the Scrapyard, but ends up running out of coal just as he gets there. Toby needs someone to stop and give him some coal, but is hard to see amongst all the scrap. Reg tries to help him be seen, but when the other engines do finally see Toby, they get the wrong idea and soon a rumour spreads across the island that the poor old Toby is being scrapped!

programme.title: Chuggington 04
programme.desc: A new trainee, Piper, arrives in Chuggington and gets a lot of attention making Toot very jealous.

programme.title: Chuggington 04
programme.desc: The trainees compete to be in Skylar’s Squad - a new rescue team.

programme.title: Charley Goes To School
programme.desc: Each pupil has been asked to bring a book to class and share their favorite story. Charley’s favorite story exists only in a very old book… when he arrives with his precious old volume, Paulie plants a doubt in Charley’s mind: it is not a real book but just a bunch of old, yellow, smelly pages!

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Hatty takes our trio to Music Land in search of a band for Tweet to sing with. In a world where everything makes music, they each find a musical instrument to play and end up being the band themselves!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: T’choupi gets a surprise when he finds out there’s a second donkey in the hamlet - a female donkey by the name of Cuddles. He and she hit it off immediately, so when Benedicte suggests they take the two donkeys for a walk in the forest, T’choupi and Nina are overjoyed! Only problem is, T’choupi pampers Cuddles so much that she keeps refusing to budge throughout the whole walk: she’d rather stop and chew on the “treats” along the way!

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Leo catches a raccoon digging around in his trash. The Junior Rangers take the raccoon back to the forest where it can find its own food. However, some unfriendly raccoons make things difficult for Leo and company...

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Flutter, the butterfly girl, tries to bake an apple pie, but unfortunately, it doesnt turn out well. With the help of a fairy, she manages to fix it and then finds a lost marker and repairs the window as well. The Lily Fairy discovers that Flutter solved everything on her own and then moves on to help others.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Alfonso, the cricket, invites Bubble, Berry, and Dolly for a visit. They make ice cream and play together. Bubble admits to cheating in the game. Because of this, the little friends come up with a new game where everyone can win."

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: The inhabitants of the forest gather on the hilltop to watch the evening meteor shower. Stanley and Balthazar want to build a seesaw but constantly encounter obstacles. The Firefly helps them, and with the assistance of the Moon, they swing on the Moon rocker seesaw. The meteor shower mesmerizes them, then they bid farewell to each other, and everyone starts heading home. The Firefly falls asleep contentedly.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: On Reggie Squirrel’s seventh birthday, he couldnt find his friends at home. He runs into Harry Hedgehog, who offers to take him for a ride in a carriage. When they return, the forest inhabitants celebrate Reggie Squirrel together, giving him seven candles as a gift. They then fly in a hot air balloon, marveling at the night sky. Finally, Reggie Squirrel happily returns home and wishes his friends a good night.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Bubble and Stanley gather chestnuts, and then they create marvelous figures out of them at the house of the stag beetle. Bubble takes the figures home, but upon seeing the mess, Stanley offers his help. In the process, they get caught up in a series of accidents, resulting in the gingerbread house breaking. Bubble receives a new gingerbread house from Rosita the rose beetle and happily tidies up his room.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula help Amma to get lunch ready. Bing watches yummy peas and delicious carrots go into the pot, but when lunch is served theyre all mixed up together and Bing doesnt like it.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing falls in love with a lost dog he and Flop find in the park and decides he wants to keep her. When the owner turns up Bing is very upset when it comes to saying goodbye to his new friend.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: When the children make Eggy heads with eggs and cress seeds, Bing gets impatient and wants his cress to grow quicker so he decides to give Eggy lots of water with the garden hose.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: The bunny gets jealous when Sula gives Pando more attention on a playdate. He tries to gain some for himself and ends up being pushed, so Amma show them how to get rid of the anger

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing is playing the talking lettuce game on Flops phone when he drops the phone and accidentally breaks it

programme.title: Bing Bunny - Shorts and characters
programme.desc: Get to know our little pets better through charming stories featuring the characters from the popular Bing series.

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: It’s Gaspard’s birthday. Simon has found out where Mommy has hidden his brother’s present. But Simon has sworn he’ll keep it a secret! Still, he can’t stop himself from arousing Gaspard’s curiosity. His little brother finally understands that the present is hidden somewhere in the house. He starts looking everywhere! Simon is getting worried. So that Gaspard won’t find it, Simon changes hiding places at the last split second. But the big surprise is for Mommy when she finds the present has disappeared! Ah, but Simon knows where it is and even more important, he’s been able to keep it a secret!

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Scoutbadger is detained by Edmund and asks Martis (his best friend) to take their group of friends to the hazelnut tree that Martis spotted from the top of his tree. It is full of nuts and they must collect them before the village Tomcats beat them to it. Martis is very proud of his task but on the way his ‘bossy’ attitude is catastrophic and irritates the children. Rosie decides to become leader instead but this does not please Martis at all.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: When Little Nutbrown Hare, Little Field Mouse and Big Nutbrown Hare go up to high meadow with Big Nutbrown Hare they get caught in the mist. It’s a little scary so they hold hands and pass the time by playing guessing games. As the mist starts to lift, they see a beautiful circle rainbow around the sun.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare is excited because Big Nutbrown Hare has agreed to meet him later to play games. When his father arrives to tell him a storm is coming and he needs to gather food instead, Little Nutbrown Hare is hiding so Big Nutbrown Hare leaves. He searches the meadow for his father, more and more disappointed, but when he learns why Big Nutbrown Hare couldn’t play this time, he understands.

programme.title: Boribon
programme.desc: Its snowing at last! Boribon goes sledding with Annalee. They have a snowball fight and build a snowman - and the snowman goes home with them. How is this possible?

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse whos long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam and Julia have planned to play in their lair but Tonio wants to find out where it is! Noit so easy to fool him. But what if this game turns out to be even more fun than the one originally planned?

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The Triplets and Eliott play cards quietly in the living room, when they smell something burning in the kitchen. What a mess! Now Mommy’s cake is ruined! Eliott is really embarrassed, he has to bake the cake again. Mrs Gzell brings her sick cat for Eliott to nurse as shes going out. Eliott gives that important task to the Triplets. They are really excited! But between Toto, a particularly annoying fly and Imhotep who does whatever he wants, the Triplets have a lot of work.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The Triplets are at the beach and they’d like to make a present for Mommy, a pucka-shell necklace. But it’s not easy when there are only mussels on the beach. When suddenly, Turbulent finds a gorgeous shell, he puts it against his ear to listen to the sea when surprise! The shell tickles him, it’s a hermit crab which fascinate Poet and Girl. They imagine themselves living great adventures in the deep sea with their new friend. But during their game, the Triplets didn’t realize the tide had risen. They are stuck on their rock, how will they escape?

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: The Chuggineers are demolishing the old cooling tower and Brewster can’t wait to watch it come down. Then an urgent job comes in and Brewster selflessly sets off to make the delivery knowing that he will have to miss the explosion. His good deed is rewarded when a problem with the detonator delays things and Brewster gets back just in time.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: While taking her class on a tour of the airport, Mrs Chen accidentally lifts off in FireSwift and it’s up to Norman to use his gaming skills to control the aircraft until the Rescue Team arrives!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: The Pontypandy Pioneers bake up a storm to earn their baking badge, but when a greasy oven bursts into flames, its time to call the rescue team!

programme.title: Kipper
programme.desc: Kipper and Tiger are having great fun with the hosepipe and paddling pool. Unfortunately Tiger didnt attach the hosepipe to the tap properly and suddenly theres water everywhere.

programme.title: Kipper
programme.desc: Pig sets up a sweet shop with Arnold as his assistant. Kipper says he’d like one of each but Pig wants to be paid. He says he’ll take a conker in exchange for a gobstopper. But he’s made the same offer to Tiger – and in a game of conkers with Kipper, it turns out Tiger’s world beating conker is, in fact, a gobstopper on a string!

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D) Mepe
programme.desc: While at the grocery store with Mommy, Caillou sees Ms. Martin outside of school for the first time. Feeling shy, he hides from her and pretends to be a secret agent where Double-O Teddy helps him learn that it’s okay to feel shy, but it’s not okay to be unkind.

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D) Mepe
programme.desc: After suggesting a game that Tina might have trouble playing with her prosthetic arm, an anxious Caillou insists they play the one game he knows she likes – Space Captain! In their space fantasy, Caillou learns that Tina is capable of more than he thought, if she’s given the opportunity to try.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Emily worries she doesnt have a best friend, but, when the other engines help her out of a tricky situation, she realises shes been surrounded by best friends all along.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: An animal statue is knocked over! Can the Junior Rangers find the culprit? Does it have anything to do with the lifelike Shoebill statue?

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Can the Junior Rangers help Kai find his sisters pet rabbit, Patches, who got lost on Rabbit Island?

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat needs to deliver special cans of blue sheep dye to Alf and his runaway sheep.

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat and Jess must deliver blocks of ice to the school so that they can make an igloo.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing makes Sula a picture with all her favourite things on it. It just needs one last jewel stuck on but oops the glue spills all over the picture. Sparkles save the day.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Sula, Pando, Flop and Padget all have a knack, something special they can all do and Bing gets frustrated when his own knacks are easy for everyone else to do.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Sula and Bing tag all their favourite things around the house with stickers, but when Sula tags Hoppity Voosh Bing is upset because he doesnt want to share.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing wants Flop to read him a story when he has his bath but gets sad when his book gets wet. Flop helps him to understand that even though the book is wet, the story isnt.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing has a great time choosing the perfect present for Sula in Padgets shop. Its a wand and is sparkly and flashy and spinny and Bing knows that she will love it. Bing is thrilled until it is time to hand the present over.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswald wakes up to hear the sounds of a parade passing outside his window. He and Weenie persuade Henry and Daisy to come to the parade, where Oswald promises them all kinds of exciting sights. But it turns out there is no parade - just Steve Tree carrying a radio. Henry and Daisy are annoyed that Oswald got them all worked up for nothing. But Oswald tells them they can have their own parade, and he organises a makeshift band to march through Big City Park.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Henry is sad because he cant fly like other birds. Oswald and Daisy try to help him realise his dream. Madame Butterfly gives him wing-flapping lessons, Daisy pushes him around on her unicycle, they all try to stir up a breeze, but nothing can get him airborne. Then the Egg Twins blow a giant bubble that envelops Henry and flies him over Big City!

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and his crew are finishing off the new extension to the Spring City Museum. They are awaiting the delivery of its first exhibit – a full sized Tyrannosaurus Rex skeleton. Mr. Bentley has come out in his lunch break to supervise the arrival of the skeleton. But while Bob is back at his yard Leo discovers to his horror that Mr. Bentley has bungled the dimensions of the doors to the new extension, and now they are unable to get the huge dinosaur skeleton inside. Lofty suggests taking the skeleton to pieces and reassembling the bones inside the building.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Jenny Dobbs, the zoo keeper, asks Bob to finish building the new bear enclosure at Spring City zoo. He plans a three-tiered natural habitat that resembles a rocky mountain, with a pool and cave for shelter. Scoop thinks the mountain needs to be a tall as possible in order to keep the bear happy, and he convinces Muck and Lofty to help him. Unfortunately they build it too high. The rocks and soil in-fill cant take the weight and the whole mountain collapses. Scoop apologises, but Bob quite likes the idea of a bigger structure and alters the design so they can re-build the mountain with four levels. They finish just in time as a crate carrying the bear arrives.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: When Little Nutbrown Hare discovers that he has grown a thick Winter coat, he and Little Field Mouse make a coat from moss to help other creatures in the meadow stay warm. They discover that everyone has their own ways of coping in the colder months, but Big Nutbrown Hare uses the coat as a picnic rug on the snow so they can enjoy a Winter feast.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare is fascinated that his friend Little Grey Squirrel is going to stay in his dray all Winter long. He and Little Field Mouse decide to hibernate in the hollow log until Spring, but soon become bored and fidgety. Little Field Mouse gives up and plays in the snow. Will Little Nutbrown Hare manage to stay inside, or will he be tempted out as well?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: After a long quiet winter in the meadow Little Nutbrown hare announces that he can’t wait for winter to be over so he can enjoy the other seasons with their special treats to see, hear and taste. Will the sound of icicles tinkling in the wind, the taste of a frozen Winter berry and some very unusual tracks in the snow convince the little hare that Winter is just as special as the other seasons?

programme.title: Learning Time With Timmy
programme.desc: Discover new words and join in the activities with Timmy and his friends in this fun learning series developed by Aardman and the British Council, world expects in teaching English.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: Peppino delivers pizzas faster than anyone in Busytown, so when the kids wait an unusually long time for their pizza to arrive, they figure something must be wrong at the pizzeria. But Peppino isnt there and neither is his delivery car. By following his delivery route, the kids ultimately find Peppino stuck in an elevator./‘Fairy dust’ and strange sightings has Hilda Hippo convinced there are real live fairies in Busytown Woods!

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world, Messy is sniffing around his sitting room trying to find out what smells so bad... Eurghh fresh laundry - Messy can’t stand this clean smell! In fact its smelly socks that smell delicious to a Messy monster! Why do some socks smell good and some bad? It’s off to Okido to find out! Felix and Zoe are outside in Okido, holding their noses against a terrible smell in the air. The smell is so terrible that Lolly thinks it’s the flowers Mayor Oki gave to her.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world, Messy is in the laundry basket, hurling socks around the bathroom. “Green, my favourite! But I wonder what makes green socks green?” He vortexes himself to Okido to find out. When Messy lands in Okido, Felix and Zoe are in the garden beating the dirt out of their tent. Dust billows out in clouds as Messy helps them, but it’s still covered in dirt. Zam asks if they need any help, because she has just the thing!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: When a comedy of errors causes Orange, Plum and Cherry to arrive late to their campout, they start off their annual tradition of telling tall-tales around the campfire by making up three outrageous, hysterical accounts of what held them up.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry accidentally smashes his mums favourite china teacup.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry needs help making up a story to go with his new drawing.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: The Junior Rangers bring a wild boar in their garden back to the forest. There, Ranger Rocky advises the Junior Rangers to find the boar’s sounder, which is a group of female wild boars and their young children.

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: Harvey and the new engine Samson are putting the dinosaur models in place for the Earl’s new Dinosaur Park. One of the dinosaurs swings towards Millie and gives her a fright. Samson and Harvey laugh, but Millie gets her own back by asking the groundsman to set his bonfire behind the model of the volcano and making them both think it’s erupting!

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: When Thomas causes a small accident by being silly he is so embarrassed that he blames it on someone else… called Geoffrey, an engine he just made up on the spur of the moment. But Thomas’ imaginary engine raises a lot of questions from his friends and soon Thomas is describing what Geoffrey looks like too. When the Fat Controller wants to meet this new engine Thomas realises that his story may have got a little out of hand!

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Grisu has to look after Thingy while his mistress Olivia is away. Grisu has to take the dog to the pet grooming shop to take a bath. But Thingy is a stubborn dog. He refuses to move forward. Grisu And Stella will have to use kindness and to be smart enough to drive the dog through the town. Without listening to his father Fume, who tries to make him use his dragon flame...

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: The shooting of the movie “The monster of the Valley”, directed by the famous Quintin Ratatino, is going badly. A fire has destroyed his mechanical monster and his film crew has deserted the scene. Grisu and Stella help to save the movie. Grisu takes on the role of the monster and Stella helps with the technique. But playing the main part in a Ratatino’s movie is not that easy, evenmore when the director asks Grisu to play the role... of a nasty dragon!

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Chilly Autumn winds blow as Little Nutbrown Hare chases the beautiful fallen leaves. When one wafts so high that only a bird could catch it Little Nutbrown Hare wishes he could fly as well. He and Little Field Mouse try every way they can think of to fly, without luck. They have fun trying, however, and along the way they discover they have their own very special talents.

programme.title: The Lost Paradise, a portrait of Arvo Part
programme.desc: He is the most performed contemporary composer in the world. Nevertheless, he also rarely ventures out in public, keeps quiet about his music, feels at home in the forests of Estonia and generates therewith – perhaps involuntarily – the impression of a recluse, which is attributed to him again and again: Arvo Part.The Estonian composer, who will celebrate his 90th birthday on September 11, 2025, verily exudes even solely by his appearance an aura of a mystic or an ascetic. He himself says: “I am no prophet, no cardinal, not a monk, not even a vegetarian.” But he is without a doubt a devout man, who has been a member of the Russian Orthodox Church since 1970, and under pressure from the Soviet apparatus of power was forced to leave his native Estonia in 1980. Via Vienna he arrived in Berlin, which for the next 30 years would become his second home and also the starting point for his international career.“The Lost Paradise” is the first international documentary about Arvo Part. It is quite an astonishment that such a shy artist has given his consent to be accompanied by a camera for an entire year: In his native Estonia, travelling to Germany, Italy, and Japan, where Part received the Praemium Imperiale, the world’s most prestigious award in the field of music, in October 2014.The film is framed by the identically named stage production “Adam’s Passion,” featuring three key works by Arvo Part, which American director Robert Wilson brought to the stage in May 2015 in a former submarine factory, the “Noblessner Foundry” in Tallinn.

programme.title: La Grande Danza - Aterballetto in Milan
programme.desc: Aterballetto is the principal producing and touring dance company in Italy. They are well-known for their ability to shift their style across a wide range of musical genres, from classical to pop and jazz. Jiří Pokorny‘s ‘Words and Space’ is a metaphor of an intrapersonal speech, a book full of floating stories. It is personal, intimate, and very poetic.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologerna undersoker Gizapyramidernas arv och de mystiska pyramider som foljde på dem. De jagar agaren till ett kolossalt begravningsschakt som skar rakt igenom det forntida begravningsfaltet i Abusir, undersoker en utsmyckad grav nara farao Djedkares pyramid i Saqqara och graver ut farao Sahures forvunna grav – den enda pyramidgraven i Egypten som annu inte utforskats.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: I skuggan av den stora pyramiden graver ett team arkeologer under ledning av dr Mark Lehner fram vad som kan vara det viktigaste kungliga palatset i det gamla Egypten. Genom att grava under en overgiven fotbollsplan hittar teamet ett spår av ledtrådar som avslojar ett centrum for byggandet av sjalva den stora pyramiden.

programme.title: To Catch A Smuggler
programme.desc: HIS Miami undersoker två smugglingsfall till havs och beslagtar over 450 kilo kokain från en yacht som kommer in från Karibien. CBP slår till mot illegal import av receptbelagda mediciner, och HSI New York arresterar en kokainkurir från Curacao som ett led i en två år lång utredning av en storskalig smugglingsoperation.

programme.title: To Catch A Smuggler
programme.desc: CBP Nogales hittar kokain I stotfångaren på en bil som anlander från Mexiko, och CBP Atlanta stoppar en kvinna som smugglar valpar från Brasilien.

programme.title: Europa från ovan
programme.desc: Det forsta avsnittet av den andra sasongen i National Geographics dokumentarserie agnas åt Sverige. Historia, kultur, stader och naturfenomen och visar upp de foranderliga årstidernas hapnadsvackande skonhet.

programme.title: Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Car SOS står infor en tuff utmaning nar de ska restaurera en sallsynt Wolseley Hornet från 1934. Med delar som ar nastan omojliga att hitta och ingen instruktionsbok att luta sig mot måste teamet forlita sig på gammaldags hantverk och experttillverkning for att blåsa nytt liv i denna en gång bortglomda parla och ta den från en bortglomd relik till vagens konung. Langs vagen ar Tim fast besluten att skapa en ny uppskattning for denna klassiska skonhet genom att vinna over en helt ny generation av yngre fans.

programme.title: Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Car SOS tar sig an en VW Polo G40 från 1991. Denna kompressormatade hot hatch tillhor 43-årige Anthony, vars forhoppningar om att få kora denna ikoniska bil grusades av en underkand besiktning 2007. Medan Fuzz återstaller bilens mekaniska hjarta reser Tim till Tyskland for att ta reda på historien bakom VW:s beslut att tillverka en Polo med kompressor. Var det ett djarvt drag att upphoja Polo till kungligheterna inom hot hatch?

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: På en spannande resa genom Spaniens anmarkningsvarda tekniska underverk får vi en inblick i den banbrytande teknik som for Barcelonas Sagrada Familia narmare fardigstallandet. Darefter avslojar vi hemligheterna bakom Sevillas rekordstora solskydd i tra och besoker en skyskrapa som tycks trotsa tyngdkraften. Slutligen får vi bevittna den intrikata restaureringen av en 2 000 år gammal romersk teater.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Vi avslojar Polens djarvaste tekniska underverk, ser en superhamn resa sig från havets djup, avslojar de anmarkningsvarda designhemligheterna bakom byggandet av EU:s hogsta byggnad, utforskar en vidstrackt underjordisk saltgruva och besoker varldens hogsta trakonstruktion, som ar 111 meter hog.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Denna vinter stalls vintervagarnas hjaltar infor rent otroliga forhållanden. En unik storm och rekorderliga regn- och snomangder genererar enorma utmaningar. Nar de stalls infor karriarens tuffaste utmaningar måste Thord och Bjoern forlita sig på varandra som aldrig forr. I norr behover o Roger att fjolårets nykomling Stig tar nasta steg och blir raddningsledare - men ar han redo?

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: I sodra Norge tvingas Thord, Bjoern och deras man ut i en av det senaste decenniets varsta stormar. De måste undsatta en lastbil full med stålbalkar, som stormvindar tvingat av vagen. Val på jobbet ger Bjoern Svein Arne en lektion i tyngdlagen. I norr skickar Jo Roger ut fjolårets nykomling, Stig på hans forsta solouppdrag for sasongen.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Bjoern hamnar under press nar en frontalkrock mellan två lastbilar blockerar en ambulans under en nodutryckning. Thord jobbar hela natten for att undsatta en forare som sitter fast i sin lastbil och måste få sin last till flygplatsen i tid. I norr overvakar Stig undsattningen av en 30 ton tung lastbil som kort rakt igenom sakerhetsstaketet och hamnar farligt nara en elstolpe.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord and Bjoern face the ultimate rescue challenge when a fully loaded truck crashes 40 metres down a mountainside and is completely destroyed. The gruelling conditions and complex logistics make this rescue one of the biggest challenges of their careers. In a nearby ski resort, Svein Arne is on a solo mission to rescue a delivery van that’s taken a very wrong turn.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Bjoern stalls infor en svår situation nar en dubbelolycka tvingar honom att be sina rivaler om hjalp. På bergets andra sida måste Thord undsatta en 14 ton tung traktor som hotar att valta in i en prima fastighet. Uppe i norr skickas Stig ut att barga en postbil från att falla utfor ett 25 meter djupt stup.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Uppe i norr stalls Jo Rogers nyborjare infor det ultimata testet nar de ska undsatta tre fordon som hamnat utanfor vagen. Nar sedan bogserbilen sjunker ner i ett djupt dike ar katastrofen nara. I soder for Thord och Andrzej en kamp mot klockan i ett forsok att radda en kraschad buss. Efter att ha upptackt ett diesellackage inser de att raddningen skulle kunna gå upp i rok.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Nar en enorm varulastbil kraschar på E6:an tar Jo Roger hjalp av sin gamle van och tidigare anstallde, Roger, som får gora comeback. I bergen i norr inser Thord och Andrzej hur det ar att behova undsattning nar två av deras uppdrag drabbas av allvarliga bakslag.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord befinner sig i en knepig situation nar polisen satter stopp for en raddningsaktion.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Vi avslojar episka byggmissar och undersoker konstruktionsfel i rymdfarjan Columbia, varfor fartyg kolliderar med broar i Kina, dålig hotelldesign, en tornkollaps i Shanghai och vardelosa flygplatser.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Vi foljer arkeologer som soker efter drottning Kleopatras grav. En grupp undervattensarkeologer dyker i Medelhavet for att utforska ruinerna av det forntida Alexandria. Ett annat team tar med några 4 000-åriga mumier till ett sjukhus for en rontgenundersokning. Vi får också folja med på en tur genom ett nyligen upptackt tunnelnatverk som kanske kan leda till den siste faraons sista viloplats!

programme.title: Cleopatras Final Secret
programme.desc: Bevapnad med den senaste tekniken och med hjalp av havsutforskaren Bob Ballard soker arkeologen Kathleen Martinez på land och under vatten efter sitt livs upptackt – Kleopatras forsvunna grav.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer undersoker forntida Egyptens mest kanda kvinnliga farao, Kleopatra. I Dendera upptacker vi hur Kleopatra utnyttjade egyptisk religion for att uppnå sina mål. På den antika platsen Philadelphia avslojar teamet en gammal kista och dyrbara gravgods for att lara sig mer om Kleopatras amnen. Och vid Taposiris Magna beger sig arkeologer under jorden for att soka efter Kleopatras forsvunna grav.

programme.title: Edge of the Unknown
programme.desc: Alex Honnold blev varldens mest beromde alpinist nar han besteg granitvaggen i Yosemite utan rep. Men hur forberedde sig Alex infor att gora det omojliga? Han och Tommy Caldwell for till Marocko och pressade sig till det yttersta på lika hoga vaggar, som kulminerade i Alex replosa klattring. Detta ar Alex outtrottliga, slitsamma process for att forvandla drommen till verklighet.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Nya officerare påborjar en elitutbildning till stridspiloter, men endast ett fåtal kommer att klara utbildningen. De kampar med precisionsbombning och utsatts for hårda bedomningar av instruktorerna.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Under en natt med kaos, krascher och konvojer blir Thord upprord nar ett annat foretag tar sig in på hans territorium. I norr tar Ole Henrik med sig foretagets nya bargningsbil på dess forsta uppdrag att radda en lastbil som kraschat djupt ner i ett snotackt dike och sedan slagit runt 90 grader. Ole Henrik ar ivrig att testa den nya bargningsbilen for att se om den ar vard den stora investeringen.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Vi avslojar Polens djarvaste tekniska underverk, ser en superhamn resa sig från havets djup, avslojar de anmarkningsvarda designhemligheterna bakom byggandet av EU:s hogsta byggnad, utforskar en vidstrackt underjordisk saltgruva och besoker varldens hogsta trakonstruktion, som ar 111 meter hog.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Vi avslojar episka byggmissar och undersoker konstruktionsfel i rymdfarjan Columbia, varfor fartyg kolliderar med broar i Kina, dålig hotelldesign, en tornkollaps i Shanghai och vardelosa flygplatser.

programme.title: Northwoods Survival
programme.desc: Margot ar mitt i vinterns djup och ger sig ut på jakt efter vardefulla palsdjur; Billy ar fast besluten att trivas i de kalla skogarna i norr och forsoker sig på att bygga ett uppvarmningssystem for varmvatten. Matty gor några rejala ”komfort”-uppgraderingar i sin nyligen utbyggda bostad på Newfoundland. Och nar Emilie och Gilbert tar en paus från stugbyggandet agnar de sig åt att sakra en traditionell och viktig matkalla.

programme.title: Northwoods Survival
programme.desc: Våren har kommit och Margot ger sig ut for att leta efter bjorn – men hamnar oga mot oga med en annu mer formidabel naturkraft. Billy drar nytta av det varmare vadret och påborjar arbetet med några valbehovliga uppgraderingar av stugan. Matty blir en riktig ”hillbilly” med sina planer på den ultimata frysboxen i skogen, och Emilie och Gilbert borjar arbeta på en ”Shabotwan” – en traditionell byggnad som de hoppas kunna fardigstalla innan vårens gåsjakt borjar.

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: I detta avsnitt av Food Factory USA: Traffa barnbarnsbarnet till och lar dig destilleringshemligheterna bakom den legendariska bourbontillverkaren Jim Beam från Kentucky; TruMoo-chokladmjolk framstalls och blandas i ofantliga mangder; och mer an en miljon Tina’s-burritos handrullas varje dag – ole!

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: I detta avsnitt av Food Factory USA: Upptack hemligheten bakom en perfekt skål utsokta ramen-nudlar – på mindre an tre minuter; det kravs en ”blackfisk”, en ”giljotin” och en ”inlindare” for att skapa denna klassiska och utsokta amerikanska godbit; och varje limpa Challah-aggbrod flatas och bakas karleksfullt for hand.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay: På ny mark
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay upptacker det isolerade Tasmanien soder om Australiens fastland. Har utforskar han ons ororda natur, dyker efter kraftor i hajrika vatten, undviker giftormar i bushen på jakt efter lokala orter, fiskar forell och samlar in unik honung. Sist moter han nomadkocken Analiese Gregory i en kockduell nar de forbereder en brakmiddag av episka proportioner.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: Smugglare anvander blekmedel och falska golv for att gomma 350 kilo kokain, men Mayaguez Air and Marine agents upptacker gomstallet. På Amerikanska Jungfruoarna jagar myndigheterna misstankta smugglare som fångats på dolda kameror. På vastra sidan av Puerto Rico upptacker man skjutvapen ombord på två fartyg som misstanks smuggla narkotika från Dominikanska republiken.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Nya officerare påborjar en elitutbildning till stridspiloter, men endast ett fåtal kommer att klara utbildningen. De kampar med precisionsbombning och utsatts for hårda bedomningar av instruktorerna.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Att landa på ett hangarfartyg – en viktig fardighet for alla stridspiloter i den amerikanska flottan – kraver absolut precision. Nar eleverna står infor den langsta och mest kravande fasen av utbildningen vet de att detta test kommer att avgora deras framtid i cockpit. Under den okande pressen borjar vissa vackla, vilket leder till en skarp varning från befalhavaren.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord och Terje riskerar sina liv for att radda en lastbil som kort in i en snovall i fjallen. I norr stalls Jo Roger och Stig infor ett stort problem nar de forsoker radda en tankbil som fastnat.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord och Bjorn arbetar for att radda en lastbil som krossat ett vagracke. Jo Roger ger sig ut for att undsatta en lastbil som ar begravd i sno, men hans lastbil tappar greppet på den isiga vagen.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Svårt vintervader for med sig kaos till bergen, och Thord borjar få slut på alternativ. Hes undsatter en 50-tonnare an ytterligare akutsamtal kommer in. Bjoern gor Thord en stor tjanst, lamnar sitt territorium och tar farjan till kusten for att radda en snoplog. Uppe i norr tar Jo Roger sig an en frontlastare i 20 minusgrader som hamnat på sidan och blockerar huvudleden soderut.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Jo Roger och Ole Henrik kampar med ett slap med salt, Thord tar hand om en lastbil som balanserar på en klippkant och Örjan stalls infor stora problem nar han ska ta sig an en traktor med trasig axel.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Bjorn och Thord samarbetar for att radda en lastbil som glidit ner i diket. Senare forsoker Jo Roger radda en skordetroska, men tappar humoret nar otåliga forare utsatter hans besattning for fara.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: På vag till ett uppdrag hamnar Terje i problem efter att ha krockat med Thords bogserbil. I bergen soker Eirik efter en sopbil som hamnat på villospår. Bjoern beger sig ut for att undsatta en fyrtiotonnare som valt i ett snodike. Hans mannar måste grava sig djupt ner under slapet for att grava tunnlar åt bogserlinorna, men om snon kollapsar under lastbilens vikt kan de alla komma att krossas.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Nar ett slap på rymmen hotar en huvudled riskerar Thord att krossas i sitt forsok att undsatta den. Nykomlingen Terje vill garna visa att han ar ratt man for ett enkelt jobb som snabbt visar sig vara raka motsatsen. I norr forsoker Torstein och Isak undsatta en mejerilastbil som valt i ett dike, men djup nsno och dolda faror satter koppar i hjulet.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: På en brant sluttning, hogt over fjorden, riskerar Bjorn allt for att radda en traktor som hotar att falla – och ta honom med sig. Thord fastnar i leran efter att en lastbil sjunkit djupt ner i en bondes åker. Nar hans bargningsbil inte kan få grepp måste han tanka i nya banor. I norr gor sig Jo Roger redo att radda en valt containerlastbil, men nar en vajer glider befarar han en katastrof.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Vi avslojar Polens djarvaste tekniska underverk, ser en superhamn resa sig från havets djup, avslojar de anmarkningsvarda designhemligheterna bakom byggandet av EU:s hogsta byggnad, utforskar en vidstrackt underjordisk saltgruva och besoker varldens hogsta trakonstruktion, som ar 111 meter hog.

programme.title: Andra varldskriget: Havets helvete
programme.desc: Andra varldskriget: Havets helvete ar en episodserie om striden under vattenytan och om de storsta ubåtarnas patrulluppdrag under kriget.

programme.title: World War II: Secrets from Above
programme.desc: April 1940: Tyska slagskepp infiltrerar norska fjordar i ett forsok att erovra viktiga hamnar och sakra Hitlers tillgång till jarnmalm. Men brittiska Royal Navy ar dem i halarna, vilket utloser en kamp om kontrollen over det neutrala Norge. Denna strid kraver banbrytande metoder for krigforing och mobiliserar motståndskampar medan hemliga kommandosoldater tavlar for att hindra nazisterna från att bygga den forsta atombomben.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Nya officerare påborjar en elitutbildning till stridspiloter, men endast ett fåtal kommer att klara utbildningen. De kampar med precisionsbombning och utsatts for hårda bedomningar av instruktorerna.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Att landa på ett hangarfartyg – en viktig fardighet for alla stridspiloter i den amerikanska flottan – kraver absolut precision. Nar eleverna står infor den langsta och mest kravande fasen av utbildningen vet de att detta test kommer att avgora deras framtid i cockpit. Under den okande pressen borjar vissa vackla, vilket leder till en skarp varning från befalhavaren.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Ett Transair-fraktplan med oljeutrustning flyger over Alperna vid kraftig turbulens nar det skakas av en explosion som sliter av båda motorer från hoger vinge. Besattningen får kampa for att styra sin stympade Boeing 707, men lyckas – trots att planet omsluts av eld – genomfora en dodsforaktande landning. Darefter ar det upp till utredarna att hitta den mikroskopiska men ack så dodliga orsaken.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Vi avslojar episka byggmissar och undersoker konstruktionsfel i rymdfarjan Columbia, varfor fartyg kolliderar med broar i Kina, dålig hotelldesign, en tornkollaps i Shanghai och vardelosa flygplatser.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Blixtar orsakar kaos i byggnader nar de slår ner. Över hela varlden sjunker stader av olika anledningar och torn kollapsar. En tunnelbanevagn i Mexico City och flera broar i Indien rasar. I Dallas blir en olycklig rivning en kopia av det lutande tornet i Pisa och en sensation på sociala medier. Vanliga manniskor visar upp sina MacGyver-fardigheter, vilket vacker frågan: geniala eller galna?

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Vi avslojar Polens djarvaste tekniska underverk, ser en superhamn resa sig från havets djup, avslojar de anmarkningsvarda designhemligheterna bakom byggandet av EU:s hogsta byggnad, utforskar en vidstrackt underjordisk saltgruva och besoker varldens hogsta trakonstruktion, som ar 111 meter hog.

programme.title: Andra varldskriget från ovan
programme.desc: WWII: Secrets From Above skildrar det andra varldskrigets mest hapnadsvackande handelser ur ett helt nytt perspektiv. Geno matt matcha fangslande bilder från fronten, sallan visade filmklipp och fantastiska flygrekognosceringsbilder och deras ursprungliga platser återskapar serien vitala slag, djarva bombrader och utvecklingen av varldens forsta massforstorelsevapen.

programme.title: Philippines Stateless Japanese
programme.desc: After WWII, thousands of children born to Japanese fathers were left behind in the Philippines. Many became stateless. Eighty years on, 50 descendants are still fighting to be recognized as Japanese.

programme.title: Trails to Oishii Tokyo mini
programme.desc: Our focus this time is wasabi. Visit a culturally significant paddy field, try a unique grater that offers stronger pungency, and learn more about the cultivation history of Japans fiery root.

programme.title: The Seasons of Yamato The 24 Solar Terms
programme.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE
programme.desc: A series of doodles by the famous artist Utagawa Kuniyoshi turn out to be carefully considered depictions of the kabuki actors of the day. What kind of artistic statement was he trying to make?

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from September 26, Day 13 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Talk it Out: A Students Forum for Japan-South Korea Ties
programme.desc: The young participants of a long-running Japan-South Korea students forum get along even if bilateral ties have sometimes been on choppy waters. We follow the latest gathering in Sapporo.

programme.title: BOSAI:Science that Can Save Your Life
programme.desc: A large-scale blackout is the total loss of power in an entire region. Hokkaidos 2018 blackout had a major impact on medical care and logistics. Find out the mechanisms and how it can be prevented.

programme.title: DESIGN MUSEUM JAPAN
programme.desc: Hokkaido / Takeya Takayuki (model maker) Fishing boats in the herring industry-which thrived here until the 1950s-featured swirling decorations that made a big impression on Takeya, a Hokkaido native.

programme.title: Vikingane
programme.desc: Rufus fra Roma sliter med å finne seg til rette i sin nye rolle som trell og trives ikke med livssituasjonen i Norheim. Den positive trellen Kark er institusjonalisert og prøver å legge livet til rette for Rufus. Det nye livet som gårdseier og ektemann blir ikke helt som Arvid forestilte seg. Jakten på en rømt trell avdekker stor magi, vekker interessen for nytenking i landsbyen og former nye vennskap. En hendelse på dostanga tar landsbyen i en ny dramatisk vending.

programme.title: Ukjent arving: Sverige
programme.desc: Kattis frys i Canada, men blir varm i hjartet når ho ser kven som skal få arva til estlendaren Raimond Pohlak.

programme.title: Helt Ramme sporter
programme.desc: 42 km løping - 23 glass rødvin. Hvem sjangler først i mål - Nicolay eller Emilie Voe Nereng?

programme.title: Emma
programme.desc: Emma spiller frisbeegolf med brødrene før hun skal på scenen på Palmesus. Men først må hun mestre et vanskelig dansetrinn. Rekker hun det før showet?

programme.title: Emma
programme.desc: Livet er hektisk når du vil satse som artist ved siden av skole, trening og familieliv. Med støtte fra hunden Tico og fansen gir Emma alt på konsert.

programme.title: Emma
programme.desc: Emma har bursdag, og feirer på skoletur i London. Mamma er med på turen, men hun er ikke den beste storbyguiden akkurat.

programme.title: Emma
programme.desc: Emma blir helt satt ut når hun møter et idol på rød løper under en prisutdeling. Men hun dropper showet – hun vil heller spise pizza hos tante!

programme.title: Ville fristelser
programme.desc: Gjengen gjenforenes etter å ha vært delt i to dager. Deltagerne møter den største fristelsen til nå, og Mona truer med å bruke opp alle pengene.

programme.title: Skeiv sommar
programme.desc: Til ein solfylt idyll i Alberta, Canada kjem unge skeive, ikkje-binære og transfolk for å vere med på sommarleir og berre vere tenåringar.

programme.title: Familien Nerdrum
programme.desc: Odd søker på Høstutstillingen og er spent på om han kommer med. Han inviterer også samtidskunstner Bjarne Melgaard til et besøk på gården.

programme.title: Singelgåten
programme.desc: Det har vært ubehagets år, og det er på tide å se om all innsatsen har gitt resultater.

programme.desc: Gunnar Smári ræðir við Hilmar Þor Hilmarsson professor um stefnubreytingu Trump gagnvart Úkraínu, sem hann segir nú að geti unnið stríð. Þeir fara líka yfir ræðu Trump í alsherjarþinginu, elta hana um víðan voll. Alvarleg staða er uppi í húsnæðismálum fjolmargra einstaklinga án þess að það fari hátt í samfelaginu. Fordomar eru miklir og harka í samfelaginu. María Petursdottir oryrki og myndlistarkona og Styrmir Hallsson, háskolanemi og ungur maður í leit að oruggu framtíðarhúsnæði, ræða ástandið með Birni Þorláks. Vorstjarnan heldur fund um málið annað kvold. Þordís Ingadottir lagaprofessor ræðir við Gunnar Smára um gildi þess að fleiri lond viðurkenna nú Palestínu, um hvort alþjoðalog og alþjoðakerfið se að veikjast vegna stefnu Bandaríkjanna og hvaða skyldur íslensk stjornvold bera frammi fyrir þjoðarmorði á Gaza og oðrum glæpum Ísraelsstjornar. Ragnar Baldursson Kínafræðingur ræðir við Gunnar Smára um Taoisma og áhrif hans á kínverska menningu, stefnu kínverska ríkisins og einnig um áhrif Tao á vestræna menningu. Þetta er fyrri hluti spjalls þeirra um Taoisma. Til marks um sprettusumarið sem nú er að baki eru dæmi um bændur á Norðurlandi sem slogu tún sín fjorum sinnum, sem er einsdæmi að sogn Trausta Þorissonar, bonda á Hofsá. Bjorn Þorláks slær á þráðinn norður.

programme.title: Rauða borðið 23. sept - Húsnæði, brottvikning, born með geðraskanir, oþekkti þingmaðurinn og bonnuð list - ENDURSÝNT
programme.desc: Á sama tíma og ungt folk er í vanda að fjárfesta í húsnæði eru heldur fleiri íbúðir að koma á markað en verið hefur. Jonas Atli Gunnarsson hjá HMS ræðir við Bjorn Þorláksson. Matthías James Spencer Heimisson og Adrimir Selene Melo Fria eru hjon. Samt ætlar Útlendingastofnun að vísa Adrimir úr landi, en hún er ein þeirra fjolmorgu frá Venesúela sem hingað komu í boði stjornvalda en nú er verið að vísa úr landi þegar dvalarleyfið rennur út. Gunnar Smári ræðir við hjonin. María Lilja ræðir þjonustu við born með geðraskanir við þær Láru Ómarsdottur, almannatengil og aðstandanda fíkils í bata, Diljá Ámundadottur, varaþingmann, guðfræðinema og sálgæslukonu og Sigurþoru Bergsdottir, varaþingmann, bæjarfulltrúa og stofnanda Bergsins Headspace. Kristján Þorður Snæbjarnarson segir Birni Þorláks frá personulegum hliðum en Kristján er einn fjolmargra nýrra þingmanna. Óþekkti þingmaðurinn leitast við að kynna manneskjuna að baki þingmannsins. María Lilja fær til sín þau Snæros Sindradottur, listfræðing og gallerista og Þránd Þorarinsson, myndlistarmann sem þekktur er fyrir hápolitísk málverk sín. Þau ræða saman um list og politík.

programme.title: Rauða borðið 22. sept - Húsnæðiskrísa, ungmennadrykkja, deilur í vinstrinu og fiðluæði Þingeyinga - ENDURSÝNT
programme.desc: Kristín Heba Gísladottir hjá Vorðu segir suma hopa í samfelaginu eiga afar erfitt með að koma ser upp oruggu þaki yfir fjolskyldur. Horfur ungs folks til að eignast húsnæði virðast velta mjog á efnahag foreldra að obreyttu. Bjorn Þorláksson ræðir við Kristínu Hebu. Guðmundur Auðunsson hagfræðingur í London fer yfir deilur innan nýja vinstri flokksins í Bretlandi. Hvað gengur þingmonnum til sem vilja lækka áfengiskaupaaldur niður í 18 ár her á landi? Er oold í uppsiglingu? Árni Guðmundsson forvarnarfulltrúi ræðir við Bjorn Þorláks og reynir að svara áleitnum spurningum. Algjor serstaða var meðal Þingeyinga til forna er kom að fiðlueign og fiðluspili. Tonlistin skipaði svo veigamikinn sess að fá dæmi eru um annað eins í dreifðum byggðum landsins. Herdís Anna Jonsdottir, víoluleikari í Sinfoníuhljomsveit Íslands, ræðir málin við Bjorn Þorláks.

programme.title: Rauða borðið - Helgi-spjall: Rúnar Guðbrands - NÝR ÞÁTTUR
programme.desc: Rúnar Guðbrandsson leikari, leikstjori og sviðslistamaður ræðir spennandi leikhús og minna spennandi, politíska list, trúnna á að við getum breytt heiminum, oryggi æskunnar og oroa unglingsáranna, foðurmissi og annað sem hefur motað hann sem manneskju og listamann.

programme.title: Rauða borðið - Vikuskammtur: Vika 39 - ENDURSÝNT
programme.desc: Í Vikuskammti við Rauða borðið sitja í dag þau Árni Sveinsson kvikmyndaleikstjori, Bjarki Þor Gronfeldt stjornmálasálfræðingur, Saga Kjartansdottir serfræðingur í vinnumarkaðsmálum hjá ASÍ og Þora Elísabet Kjeld kennari og ræða frettir vikunnar sem einkenndust af dularfullum dronum, tárum á hvarmi, afsokunarbeiðni, vinnumansali, skoðanaskiptum og hotunum.

programme.title: Úrval vikunnar 27. sept - Vika 39
programme.desc: Kristín Heba Gísladottir forstoðukona Vorðu lýsir áhrifum húsnæðiskerfisins á stoðu ýmissa hopa, Jonas Atli Gunnarsson hagfræðingur hjá HMS greinir stoðuna og María Petursdottir oryrki og myndlistarkona og Styrmir Hallsson, ungur maður í leit að oruggu húsnæði, ræða ástandið á húsnæðismarkaði. Þordís Ingadottir lagaprofessor ræðir um gildi þess að fleiri lond viðurkenna nú Palestínu og Hilmar Þor Hilmarsson professor ræðir um stefnubreytingu Trump gagnvart Úkraínu. Lára Ómarsdottir, almannatengil og aðstandandi fíkils í bata, Diljá Ámundadottir, varaþingmaður, guðfræðinemi og sálgæslukona og Sigurþora Bergsdottir, varaþingmaður, bæjarfulltrúi og stofnandi Bergsins Headspace ræða stoðu barna með geðraskanir og fíknivanda. Kolbeinn H. Stefánsson dosent í felagsráðgjof ræðir um vanda vinstrisins á Vesturlondum og her heima. Ragnar Baldursson Kínafræðingur ræðir um Taoisma og áhrif hans á kínverska menningu og stefnu kínverska ríkisins í tvískiptu viðtali. Kristján Þorður Snæbjarnarson er oþekkti þingmaðurinn þessa viku. Snæros Sindradottir, listfræðingur og galleristi, og Þrándur Þorarinsson myndlistarmaður ræða saman um list og politík. Kristinn Sigmundsson bassi, Kolbeinn Ketilsson tenor og Matthildur Anna Gísladottir píanoleikari ræða um ljoðasong við Gunnar Smára og tonlistarnemana Soleyju Lou Smáradottur og Sol Bjornsdottur.

programme.title: Midway
programme.desc: Myndin dregur nafn sitt af samnefndri sjoorrustu á milli Bandaríkjanna og Japans í heimsstyrjoldinni síðari sem átti ser stað vestan við Midway-eyju á Kyrrahafi 4.–7. júní 1942.

programme.title: Kidnapping Mr. Heineken
programme.desc: Forsagan að skipulagningu, framkvæmd, eftirmála og að lokum endalokum mannræningja bjormogúlsins Alfred "Freddy" Heineken, en greitt var hæsta lausnargjald sem nokkurn tímann hefur verið greitt fyrir einstakling, í þessu máli. Þann 9. november árið 1983 var Alfred Heineken, eiganda bjorveldisins, rænt fyrir framan hofuðstoðvar fyrirtækisins í Amsterdam. Ránið var framkvæmt af fjorum monnum sem hofðu ásamt fimmta manninum skipulagt það í tvo ár áður en þeir letu til skarar skríða. Í myndinni er farið yfir málið frá upphafi til enda, allt frá því að hugmyndin kom upp í kolli forsprakka mannræningjanna þar til þeir voru dæmdir fyrir glæpinn, en Heineken-fjolskyldan ákvað að greiða lausnarfeð, þvert á vilja logreglunnar, sem um leið varð hæsta upphæð sem nokkurn tíma hafði verið greidd í mannránsmáli.

programme.title: Colette
programme.desc: Sidonie-Gabrielle Colette fæddist árið 1873 og giftist árið 1893 rithofundinum og útgefandanum Henry Gauthier-Villars. Hann hvatti hana til að skrifa sogur og úr varð að Colette skrifaði fjorar bækur um unglingsstúlkuna Claudine sem urðu mjog vinsælar. Vandamálið var að Henry hafði gefið sogurnar út í eigin nafni og við það gat Colette ekki sætt sig til lengdar.

programme.desc: Spennandi þáttaroð úr smiðju Steven Spielberg þar sem personulegar sogur, spenna og hasar tvinnast saman.

programme.desc: Bresk sannsoguleg gamanmynd frá 2016 með Meryl Streep í hlutverki hefðarfrúarinnar Florence Foster Jenkins sem er staðráðin í að láta draum sinn um að verða operusongkona rætast þrátt fyrir að hafa litla sem enga songhæfileika. Leikstjori: Stephen Frears. Önnur hlutverk: Hugh Grant, Simon Helberg og Rebecca Ferguson.

programme.desc: Maja reynir að ná tokum á lífi sínu og komast að því hver hún er án eiginmannsins síns eftir að hann oskar skyndilega eftir skilnaði.

programme.title: 21 Bridges
programme.desc: Horkuspennandi glæpamynd frá 2019 með Chadwick Boseman, Siennu Miller og J.K. Simmons í aðalhlutverkum.Andre Davis er logregluforingi í New York sem kvold eitt er kallaður til vettvangsrannsoknar þar sem átta logreglumenn hafa verið skotnir til bana með oflugum velbyssum. Til að handsama þá seku grípur Andre til þess ráðs að loka Manhattan fyrir allri umferð og leggur um leið starf sitt undir að honum takist að finna morðingjana áður en nottin er úti.

programme.desc: Carrie has been put in charge of overseeing a group of people who will be organizing and distributing legal documents for one of her firms big cases. Doug is disappointed by her new appointment because this means that they wont be spending any time together, but then decides to use her time away as an opportunity to do whatever he wants – eat in bed, not brush his teeth before he goes to sleep, etc. Unfortunately, he starts to get a little lonely but soon discovers that Arthur makes a suitable companion to keep him company.
